3434478Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CriterionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string PropertyName;Di2015NewLine    public object Value;Di2015NewLine    public ExpressionType RestrictionType;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[....]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<Criterion> GetCriteria<T>(Expression<Func<T, bool>> expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return getCriteria<T>(expression.Body);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<Criterion> getCriteria<T>(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (expression is BinaryExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var bin = (BinaryExpression) expression;Di2015NewLine        if (bin.NodeType == ExpressionType.And || bin.NodeType == ExpressionType.AndAlso ||Di2015NewLine            bin.NodeType == ExpressionType.Or || bin.NodeType == ExpressionType.OrElse)Di2015NewLine            return getCriteria<T>(bin.Left).Concat(getCriteria<T>(bin.Right));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bin.Left is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var me = (MemberExpression) bin.Left;Di2015NewLine            if (!(bin.Right is ConstantExpression))Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Constant expected in criterion: " + bin.ToString());Di2015NewLine            return new[] { new Criterion {Di2015NewLine                PropertyName = me.Member.Name,Di2015NewLine                Value = ((ConstantExpression) bin.Right).Value,Di2015NewLine                RestrictionType = bin.NodeTypeDi2015NewLine            } };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException("Unsupported binary operator: " + bin.NodeType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new InvalidOperationException("Unsupported expression type: " + expression.GetType().Name);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3434562Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static List<string> area1 = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        static List<string> area2 = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        static int areaHeights = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Number of rows for each areaDi2015NewLine            areaHeights = (Console.WindowHeight - 2) / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            drawScreen();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // jumb between areasDi2015NewLine                if (i % 2 == 0)Di2015NewLine                    AddLineToBuffer(ref area1, Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    AddLineToBuffer(ref area2, Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                drawScreen();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void AddLineToBuffer(ref List<string> areaBuffer, string line)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            areaBuffer.Insert(0, line);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (areaBuffer.Count == areaHeights)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                areaBuffer.RemoveAt(areaHeights - 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void drawScreen()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Draw the area dividerDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < area2.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.SetCursorPosition(0, currentLine - (i + 1));Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(area2[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.SetCursorPosition(0, Console.WindowHeight - 1);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("> ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3435626Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass someclass {Di2015NewLine    public static void doIp(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        uint j, k; // these are just counters, so uint is fineDi2015NewLine        byte val;Di2015NewLine        byte[] buf = new byte[8];  // syntax changed hereDi2015NewLine        byte p;                    // you end up using p simply as an offset from bufDi2015NewLine        byte i = 8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(i=0; i<8; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            val = data[i];Di2015NewLine            p = 3;Di2015NewLine            j = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for(k=0; k<=4; k+=4)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    buf[p+k] >>= 1;Di2015NewLine                    if((val & 1) != 0) buf[p+k] |= 0x80; // must test against 0 explicitly in C#Di2015NewLine                    val >>= 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                p--;Di2015NewLine            } while(--j != 0); // must test against 0 explicitly in C#Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Array.Copy(buf, data, 8);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3439046Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int Compare(object x,object y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // changed codeDi2015NewLine    if (x == null && y == null)Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    if (x == null)Di2015NewLine        return 1;Di2015NewLine    if (y == null)Di2015NewLine        return -1;Di2015NewLine    // end of changed codeDi2015NewLine    int[][] arrayA = (int[][])x;Di2015NewLine    int[][] arrayB = (int[][])y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     int resultA = arrayA[1].Sum();Di2015NewLine     int resultB = arrayB[1].Sum();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return resultA.CompareTo(resultB);          Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3439609Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IDictionary<string, RequestToken> RequestTokens = Di2015NewLine   new Dictionary<string, RequestToken>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic MyResponse MyMethod(MyRequest request)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // get the MD5 for the requestDi2015NewLine   var md5 = GetMD5Hash(request);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // check if another thread is processing/has processed an identical requestDi2015NewLine   RequestToken token;Di2015NewLine   if (RequestTokens.TryGetValue(md5, out token))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // if the token exists already then wait till we can acquire the lockDi2015NewLine      // which indicates the processing has finished and a response is readyDi2015NewLine      // for us to reuseDi2015NewLine      lock (token.Sync)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         return token.Response;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   elseDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      var token = new Token(md5);Di2015NewLine      lock (token.Sync)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         RequestTokens.Add(md5, token);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // do processing here..Di2015NewLine         var response = ....Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         token.Response = response;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         return response;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class RequestTokenDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   private readonly object _sync = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public RequestToken(string md5)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      MD5 = md5;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public string MD5 { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public object Sync { get { return _sync; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public MyResponse Response { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3442798Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<T> Values()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Stack<Node> stack = new Stack<Node>();Di2015NewLine    Node current = this.root;Di2015NewLine    while(current != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while(current.leftChild != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(current);Di2015NewLine            current = current.leftChild;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return current.data;Di2015NewLine        while(current.rightChild == null && stack.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            current = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine            yield return current.data;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        current = current.rightChild;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3447376Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IWorkProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool ShouldStop { get; }Di2015NewLine    long? GetWork();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Program : IWorkProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Main Thread uses to indicate to New Thread to stopDi2015NewLine    private static bool _shouldStop = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Main Thread passes ongoing updates to New Thread via this queueDi2015NewLine    private static ConcurrentQueue<long> _workQueue = new ConcurrentQueue<long>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool ShouldStop { get { return _shouldStop; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public long? GetWork()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long currentValue;Di2015NewLine        bool worked = _workQueue.TryDequeue(out currentValue);Di2015NewLine        if (worked)Di2015NewLine            return currentValue;Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class WorkerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private long _results;Di2015NewLine    private readonly IWorkProvider _workProvider;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public long Results { get { return _results; }}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Worker(IWorkProvider workProvider)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _workProvider = workProvider;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DoWork()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Update SummaryDi2015NewLine        while (!_workProvider.ShouldStop)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long? work = _workProvider.GetWork();Di2015NewLine            if (work.HasValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _results += work.Value;Di2015NewLine                Debug.WriteLine("DeQueue: " + work.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(10);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

     xmlDoc.WriteTo(xw);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result = sw.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result.Substring(6, result.Length - 7);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3461081Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<Rectangle> FindImageTiles(Bitmap compositeImage)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<Rectangle>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Scan for a non-empty region that hasn't already been "captured"Di2015NewLine    for (var x = 0; x < compositeImage.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (var y = 0; y < compositeImage.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Only process the pixel if we don't have a rectangle thatDi2015NewLine            // already contains this and if it's not emptyDi2015NewLine            if (!result.Any(r => r.Contains(x, y)) Di2015NewLine                && compositeImage.GetPixel(x, y).A != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Now that we've found a point, create a rectangleDi2015NewLine                // surrounding that point, then expand outward untilDi2015NewLine                // we have a bounding rectangle that doesn't intersectDi2015NewLine                // with the tileDi2015NewLine                var rect = new Rectangle(x - 1, y - 1, 2, 2);Di2015NewLine                bool foundBounds = false;Di2015NewLine                while (!foundBounds)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var xRange = Enumerable.Range(rect.Left, rect.Right)Di2015NewLine                        .Where(px => px >= 0 && px < compositeImage.Width);Di2015NewLine                    var yRange = Enumerable.Range(rect.Top, rect.Bottom)Di2015NewLine                        .Where(py => py >= 0 && py < compositeImage.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Adjust the topDi2015NewLine                    if (rect.Top >= 0 Di2015NewLine                        && xRangeDi2015NewLine                            .Select(bx => compositeImage.GetPixel(bx, rect.Top))Di2015NewLine                            .Any(p => p.A != 0))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        rect.Y--;Di2015NewLine                        rect.Height++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (rect.Bottom < compositeImage.HeightDi2015NewLine                        && xRangeDi2015NewLine                            .Select(bx => compositeImage.GetPixel(bx, rect.Bottom))Di2015NewLine                            .Any(p => p.A != 0))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        rect.Height++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (rect.Left >= 0Di2015NewLine                        && yRangeDi2015NewLine                            .Select(by => compositeImage.GetPixel(rect.Left, by))Di2015NewLine                            .Any(p => p.A != 0))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        rect.X--;Di2015NewLine                        rect.Width++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (rect.Right < compositeImage.WidthDi2015NewLine                        && yRangeDi2015NewLine                            .Select(by => compositeImage.GetPixel(rect.Right, by))Di2015NewLine                            .Any(p => p.A != 0))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        rect.Width++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        foundBounds = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                result.Add(rect);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

    //newDi2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> pair in this.Attributes) //newDi2015NewLine            {                                                              //newDi2015NewLine                myDictionary.Add(pair.Key, pair.Value);                    //newDi2015NewLine            }                                                              //new Di2015NewLine            //foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> pair in this.Attributes)Di2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> pair in myDictionary)    //changedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string key = pair.Key;Di2015NewLine                if (!string.Equals(key, "id", StringComparison.Ordinal) || !string.IsNullOrEmpty(pair.Value))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string str2 = HttpUtility.HtmlAttributeEncode(pair.Value);Di2015NewLine                    builder.AppendFormat(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, " {0}=\\"{1}\\"", new object[] { key, str2 });Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3474261Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string ToUpperFirstLetter(this string source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(source))Di2015NewLine        return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    // convert to char array of the stringDi2015NewLine    char[] letters = source.ToCharArray();Di2015NewLine    // upper case the first charDi2015NewLine    letters[0] = char.ToUpper(letters[0]);Di2015NewLine    // return the array made of the new char arrayDi2015NewLine    return new string(letters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3474514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class LinkedListExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static LinkedList<T> SwapPairwise<T>(this LinkedList<T> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var current = source.First;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (current == null)Di2015NewLine            return source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (current.Next != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            current.SwapWith(current.Next);Di2015NewLine            current = current.Next;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (current != null)Di2015NewLine                current = current.Next;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return source;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void SwapWith<T>(this LinkedListNode<T> first, LinkedListNode<T> second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (first == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("first");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (second == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("second");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tmp = first.Value;Di2015NewLine        first.Value = second.Value;Di2015NewLine        second.Value = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3477727Di2015UniqueSeparatorWinSDK.RECT parentRect = new WinSDK.RECT();Di2015NewLine            WinSDK.RECT intersectRect = new WinSDK.RECT();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Rectangle parentRectangle = new Rectangle();Di2015NewLine            Rectangle intersectRectangle = new Rectangle();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the current Handle.Di2015NewLine            IntPtr currentHandle = this.Handle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get next Parent Handle.Di2015NewLine            IntPtr parentHandle = WinSDK.GetParent(this.Handle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the Rect for the current Window.Di2015NewLine            WinSDK.GetWindowRect(this.Handle, out intersectRect);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Load Current Window Rect into a System.Drawing.RectangleDi2015NewLine            intersectRectangle = new Rectangle(intersectRect.left, intersectRect.top, intersectRect.right - intersectRect.left, intersectRect.bottom - intersectRect.top );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Itterate through all parent windows and get the overlap of the visible areas to find out what's actually visible.Di2015NewLine            while (parentHandle != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Get the Rect for the Parent Window.Di2015NewLine                WinSDK.GetWindowRect(parentHandle, out parentRect);Di2015NewLine                parentRectangle = new Rectangle(parentRect.left, parentRect.top, parentRect.right - parentRect.left, parentRect.bottom - parentRect.top);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get the intersect between the current and parent window.Di2015NewLine                intersectRectangle.Intersect(parentRectangle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Set up for next loop.Di2015NewLine                currentHandle = parentHandle;Di2015NewLine                parentHandle = WinSDK.GetParent(currentHandle);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return intersectRectangle;Di2015NewLine

3478515Di2015UniqueSeparator    public delegate void CustomEventHandler(object sender, EventArgs e, string eventName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Delegate CreateEventHandler(EventInfo evt, CustomEventHandler d)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var handlerType = evt.EventHandlerType;Di2015NewLine        var eventParams = handlerType.GetMethod("Invoke").GetParameters();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //lambda: (object x0, EventArgs x1) => d(x0, x1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This defines the incoming parameters of our dynamic method.  Di2015NewLine        // The method signature will look something like this:Di2015NewLine        // void dynamicMethod(object x0, EventArgs<T> x1)Di2015NewLine        // Each parameter is dynamically determined via the Di2015NewLine        // EventInfo that was passed.Di2015NewLine        var parameters = eventParams.Select((p, i) => Expression.Parameter(p.ParameterType, "x" + i)).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the MethodInfo for the method we'll be invoking *within* ourDi2015NewLine        // dynamic method.  Since we already know the signature of this method,Di2015NewLine        // we supply the types directly.Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo targetMethod = d.GetType().GetMethod(Di2015NewLine            "Invoke", Di2015NewLine            new Type[] { typeof(object), typeof(EventArgs), typeof(string) }Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Next, we need to convert the incoming parameters to the typesDi2015NewLine        // that are expected in our target method.  The second parameter,Di2015NewLine        // in particular, needs to be downcast to an EventArgs objectDi2015NewLine        // in order for the call to succeed.Di2015NewLine        var p1 = Expression.Convert(parameters[0], typeof(object));Di2015NewLine        var p2 = Expression.Convert(parameters[1], typeof(EventArgs));Di2015NewLine        var p3 = Expression.Constant(evt.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Generate an expression that represents our method call.  Di2015NewLine        // This generates an expression that looks something like:Di2015NewLine        // d.Invoke(x0, x1, "eventName");Di2015NewLine        var body = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine            Expression.Constant(d),Di2015NewLine            targetMethod,Di2015NewLine            p1,Di2015NewLine            p2,Di2015NewLine            p3Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert the entire expression into our shiny new, dynamic method.Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda(body, parameters.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert our method into a Delegate, so we can use it for event handlers.Di2015NewLine        return Delegate.CreateDelegate(handlerType, lambda.Compile(), "Invoke", false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3480251Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void AddDataToGraph(ZedGraphControl zg1, XDate xValue, double yValue1, double yValue2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Make sure that the curvelist has at least one curveDi2015NewLine        if (zg1.GraphPane.CurveList.Count <= 0)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the first CurveItem in the graphDi2015NewLine        LineItem curve = zg1.GraphPane.CurveList[0] as LineItem;Di2015NewLine        LineItem curve2 = zg1.GraphPane.CurveList[1] as LineItem;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (curve == null || curve2 == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the PointPairListDi2015NewLine        IPointListEdit list = curve.Points as IPointListEdit;Di2015NewLine        IPointListEdit list2 = curve2.Points as IPointListEdit;Di2015NewLine        // If this is null, it means the reference at curve.Points does notDi2015NewLine        // support IPointListEdit, so we won't be able to modify itDi2015NewLine        if (list == null || list2 == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add new data points to the graphDi2015NewLine        list.Add(xValue, yValue1);Di2015NewLine        list2.Add(xValue, yValue2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // force redrawDi2015NewLine        zg1.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3482337Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void UpdateDemographics(Int32 customerID,Di2015NewLine    string demoXml, string connectionString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Update the demographics for a store, which is stored Di2015NewLine    // in an xml column. Di2015NewLine    string commandText = "UPDATE Sales.Store SET Demographics = @demographics "Di2015NewLine        + "WHERE CustomerID = @ID;";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (SqlConnection connection = new SqlConnection(connectionString))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SqlCommand command = new SqlCommand(commandText, connection);Di2015NewLine        command.Parameters.Add("@ID", SqlDbType.Int);Di2015NewLine        command.Parameters["@ID"].Value = customerID;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Use AddWithValue to assign Demographics.Di2015NewLine        // SQL Server will implicitly convert strings into XML.Di2015NewLine        command.Parameters.AddWithValue("@demographics", demoXml);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            connection.Open();Di2015NewLine            Int32 rowsAffected = command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("RowsAffected: {0}", rowsAffected);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3482337Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string MySqlEscape(this string usString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (usString == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // SQL Encoding for MySQL Recommended here:Di2015NewLine    // http://au.php.net/manual/en/function.mysql-real-escape-string.phpDi2015NewLine    // it escapes \\r, \\n, \\x00, \\x1a, baskslash, single quotes, and double quotesDi2015NewLine    return Regex.Replace(usString, @"[\\r\\n\\x00\\x1a\\\\'""]", @"\\$0");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3484005Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread.CurrentThread.Priority = ThreadPriority.Highest;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Declaration.txt is a copy of the Declaration of IndependenceDi2015NewLine        // which can be found here: http://en.wikisource.org/wiki/United_States_Declaration_of_IndependenceDi2015NewLine        string declaration = File.ReadAllText("Declaration.txt");Di2015NewLine        string[] items = declaration.ToLower().Split(new char[] { ',', '.', ':', ';', '-', '\\r', '\\n', '\\t', ' ' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // pre-execute outside timing loopDi2015NewLine        LinqMethodToArray(items);Di2015NewLine        LinqMethod(items);Di2015NewLine        HashMethod(items);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int iterations = 1000;Di2015NewLine        long min1 = long.MaxValue, max1 = long.MinValue, sum1 = 0;Di2015NewLine        long min2 = long.MaxValue, max2 = long.MinValue, sum2 = 0;Di2015NewLine        long min3 = long.MaxValue, max3 = long.MinValue, sum3 = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Iterations: {0}", iterations);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Total words: {0}", items.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int n = 0; n < iterations; n++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sw.Reset();Di2015NewLine            sw.Start();Di2015NewLine            LinqMethodToArray(items);Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine            sum1 += sw.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLine            if (sw.ElapsedTicks < min1)Di2015NewLine                min1 = sw.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLine            if (sw.ElapsedTicks > max1)Di2015NewLine                max1 = sw.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Reset();Di2015NewLine            sw.Start();Di2015NewLine            LinqMethod(items);Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine            sum2 += sw.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLine            if (sw.ElapsedTicks < min2)Di2015NewLine                min2 = sw.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLine            if (sw.ElapsedTicks > max2)Di2015NewLine                max2 = sw.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sw.Reset();Di2015NewLine            sw.Start();Di2015NewLine            HashMethod(items);Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine            sum3 += sw.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLine            if (sw.ElapsedTicks < min3)Di2015NewLine                min3 = sw.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLine            if (sw.ElapsedTicks > max3)Di2015NewLine                max3 = sw.ElapsedTicks;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0,-10} {1,-10} {2,-10} Method", "Min", "Max", "Mean");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0,-10} {1,-10} {2,-10} LinkMethodToArray", min1, max1, (double)sum1 / iterations);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0,-10} {1,-10} {2,-10} LinkMethod", min2, max2, (double)sum2 / iterations);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0,-10} {1,-10} {2,-10} HashMethod", min3, max3, (double)sum3 / iterations);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void LinqMethodToArray(string[] items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ranking = (from item in itemsDi2015NewLine                       group item by item into rDi2015NewLine                       orderby r.Count() descendingDi2015NewLine                       select new { Name = r.Key, Rank = r.Count() }).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        for (int n = 0; n < ranking.Length; n++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var item = ranking[n];Di2015NewLine            DoSomethingWithItem(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void LinqMethod(string[] items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ranking = (from item in itemsDi2015NewLine                       group item by item into rDi2015NewLine                       orderby r.Count() descendingDi2015NewLine                       select new { Name = r.Key, Rank = r.Count() });Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in ranking)Di2015NewLine            DoSomethingWithItem(item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void HashMethod(string[] items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ranking = new Dictionary<string, int>(items.Length / 2);Di2015NewLine        foreach (string item in items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!ranking.ContainsKey(item))Di2015NewLine                ranking[item] = 1;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                ranking[item]++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<KeyValuePair<string, int>>(ranking);Di2015NewLine        list.Sort((a, b) => b.Value.CompareTo(a.Value));Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, int> pair in list)Di2015NewLine            DoSomethingWithItem(pair);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static volatile object hold;Di2015NewLine    static void DoSomethingWithItem(object item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This method exists solely to prevent the compiler fromDi2015NewLine        // optimizing use of the item away so that this programDi2015NewLine        // can be executed in Release build, outside the debugger.Di2015NewLine        hold = item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3486795Di2015UniqueSeparator   public class LambdaCriteries<T> : List<Expression<Func<T, bool>>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Expression<Func<T, bool>> GetFinalLambdaExpression()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var par = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        var intial = Expression.Invoke(this.First(),par);Di2015NewLine        var sec = Expression.Invoke(this.Skip(1).First(),par);Di2015NewLine        BinaryExpression binaryExpression = Expression.And(intial, sec);Di2015NewLine        if (this.Count> 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var ex in this.ToList().Skip(2))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                binaryExpression = Expression.And(binaryExpression, Expression.Invoke(ex, par));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(binaryExpression,par);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(binaryExpression,par);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3487790Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<T> Merge<T>(this IEnumerable<T> coll, Di2015NewLine                      Func<T,T,bool> canBeMerged, Func<T,T,T>mergeItems)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using(IEnumerator<T> iter = col.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (iter.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          T lhs = iter.Current;Di2015NewLine          while(iter.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine              T rhs = iter.Current;Di2015NewLine              if (canBeMerged(lhs, rhs)Di2015NewLine                 lhs=mergeItems(lhs, rhs);Di2015NewLine              elseDi2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                 yield return lhs;Di2015NewLine                 lhs= rhs;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          yield return lhs;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3490711Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar output = String.Join(", ",Di2015NewLine    times.Select(to => newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        prefix = to == times.First(t => t.isMatinee) ? "(" : "",Di2015NewLine        time = to.time,Di2015NewLine        fmt = to.time.Hour < 12Di2015NewLine            ? (to == times.First(t => t.time.Hour < 12) ? ")" : "",Di2015NewLine    })Di2015NewLine    .Select(x => String.Format("{0}{1}{2}", x.prefix, x.time.ToString(x.fmt), x.suffix)));Di2015NewLine

3491982Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLine[TypeConverter(typeof(CustomObjectType.CustomObjectConverter))]Di2015NewLinepublic class CustomObjectTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Category("Standard")]Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<CustomProperty> props = new List<CustomProperty>();Di2015NewLine    [Browsable(false)]Di2015NewLine    public List<CustomProperty> Properties { get { return props; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, object> values = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object this[string name]Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { object val; values.TryGetValue(name, out val); return val; }Di2015NewLine        set { values.Remove(name); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class CustomObjectConverter : ExpandableObjectConverterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public override PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties(ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, Attribute[] attributes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var stdProps = base.GetProperties(context, value, attributes);Di2015NewLine            CustomObjectType obj = value as CustomObjectType;Di2015NewLine            List<CustomProperty> customProps = obj == null ? null : obj.Properties;Di2015NewLine            PropertyDescriptor[] props = new PropertyDescriptor[stdProps.Count + (customProps == null ? 0 : customProps.Count)];Di2015NewLine            stdProps.CopyTo(props, 0);Di2015NewLine            if (customProps != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int index = stdProps.Count;Di2015NewLine                foreach (CustomProperty prop in customProps)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    props[index++] = new CustomPropertyDescriptor(prop);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return new PropertyDescriptorCollection(props);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private class CustomPropertyDescriptor : PropertyDescriptorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly CustomProperty prop;Di2015NewLine        public CustomPropertyDescriptor(CustomProperty prop) : base(prop.Name, null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.prop = prop;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override string Category { get { return "Dynamic"; } }Di2015NewLine        public override string Description { get { return prop.Desc; } }Di2015NewLine        public override string Name { get { return prop.Name; } }Di2015NewLine        public override bool ShouldSerializeValue(object component) { return ((CustomObjectType)component)[prop.Name] != null; }Di2015NewLine        public override void ResetValue(object component) { ((CustomObjectType)component)[prop.Name] = null; }Di2015NewLine        public override bool IsReadOnly { get { return false; } }Di2015NewLine        public override Type PropertyType { get { return prop.Type; } }Di2015NewLine        public override bool CanResetValue(object component) { return true; }Di2015NewLine        public override Type ComponentType { get { return typeof(CustomObjectType); } }Di2015NewLine        public override void SetValue(object component, object value) { ((CustomObjectType)component)[prop.Name] = value; }Di2015NewLine        public override object GetValue(object component) { return ((CustomObjectType)component)[prop.Name] ?? prop.DefaultValue; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CustomPropertyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Desc { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public object DefaultValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    Type type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Type TypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return type;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                type = value;Di2015NewLine                DefaultValue = Activator.CreateInstance(value);Di2015NewLine        }              Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [STAThread]Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Application.EnableVisualStyles();Di2015NewLine        var obj = new CustomObjectTypeDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Name = "Foo",Di2015NewLine            Properties =Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                new CustomProperty { Name = "Bar", Type = typeof(int), Desc = "I'm a bar"},Di2015NewLine                new CustomProperty { Name = "When", Type = typeof(DateTime), Desc = "When it happened"},Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        Application.Run(new Form { Controls = { new PropertyGrid { SelectedObject = obj, Dock = DockStyle.Fill } } });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3492421Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int x;Di2015NewLine    private int y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Base(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.x = x;Di2015NewLine        this.y = y;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// option 1, pass in values as parameters to constructor:Di2015NewLineclass Child1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Child(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine        : base(x, y) // this passes the values up to the base constructorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// option 2, pass literals to the base constructor:Di2015NewLineclass Child2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Child()Di2015NewLine        : base(3, 4) // this passes the literal values 3 and 4 to the base constructorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// elsewhereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar child1 = new Child1(1, 2); // child1.x = 1, child1.y = 2Di2015NewLinevar child2 = new Child2(); // child2.x = 3, child2.y = 4Di2015NewLine
3492421Di2015UniqueSeparatorSomeAction
3492421Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public virtual void SomeAction()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine("Base.SomeAction");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DifferentAction()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine("Base.DifferentAction");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass DerivedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // this is a normal overrideDi2015NewLine    public override void SomeAction()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine("Derivde.SomeAction");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this is an advanced technique which you should try to avoid in most casesDi2015NewLine    public new void DifferentAcion()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Out.WriteLine("Derived.DifferentAction");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// elsewhereDi2015NewLinevar base = new Base();Di2015NewLinebase.SomeAction(); // prints Base.SomeActionDi2015NewLinebase.DifferentAction(); // prints Base.DifferentActionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar derived = new Derived();Di2015NewLinederived.SomeAction(); // prints Derived.SomeActionDi2015NewLinederived.DifferentAction(); // prints Derived.DifferentActionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine((Base) derived).SomeAction(); // prints Derived.SomeActionDi2015NewLine((Base) derived).DifferentAction(); // prints Base.DifferentActionDi2015NewLine

3492753Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool EqualSortedDict<K, V>(SortedDictionary<K, V> x, SortedDictionary<K, V> y)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if(ReferenceEquals(x, y))Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine  if(ReferenceEquals(x, null) || ReferenceEquals(y, null))Di2015NewLine    return false; //both being null already hit above.Di2015NewLine  if(x.Count != y.Count)Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine  if(!x.Comparer.Equals(y.Comparer))Di2015NewLine    return false;//check if this is what you need. Probably is but mightDi2015NewLine                 //not be in some cases.Di2015NewLine  foreach(KeyValuePair<K, V> kvp in x)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    V cmpValue = default(V);Di2015NewLine    if(!y.TryGetValue(kvp.Key, out cmpValue) || !kvp.Value.Equals(cmpValue))Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3493166Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> BuildAddressWhereClause<T>(IEnumerable<T> source, string value, AddressSearchOptions options, Func<T, Address> addressExtractor) { Di2015NewLine    string search = value.ToUpper(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((options & AddressSearchOptions.Address1To4) == AddressSearchOptions.Address1To4) { Di2015NewLine        source = source.Where(o => addressExtractor(o).Address1.ToUpper().Contains(search) Di2015NewLine                                   || addressExtractor(o).Address2.ToUpper().Contains(search) Di2015NewLine                                   || addressExtractor(o).Address3.ToUpper().Contains(search) Di2015NewLine                                   || addressExtractor(o).Address4.ToUpper().Contains(search)); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((options & AddressSearchOptions.City) == AddressSearchOptions.City) { Di2015NewLine        source = source.Where(o => addressExtractor(o).City.ToUpper().Contains(search)); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((options & AddressSearchOptions.PostCode) == AddressSearchOptions.PostCode) { Di2015NewLine        source = source.Where(o => addressExtractor(o).PostCode.ToUpper().Contains(search)); Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return source; Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

3493807Di2015UniqueSeparatorInt32 GetRecordSize(Type recordType) {Di2015NewLine  return recordType.GetFields().Select(fieldInfo => GetFieldSize(fieldInfo)).Sum();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineInt32 GetFieldSize(FieldInfo fieldInfo) {Di2015NewLine  if (fieldInfo.FieldType.IsArray) {Di2015NewLine    // The size of an array is the size of the array elements multiplied by theDi2015NewLine    // length of the array.Di2015NewLine    var arraySizeAttribute = (ArraySizeAttribute) Attribute.GetCustomAttribute(fieldInfo, typeof(ArraySizeAttribute));Di2015NewLine    if (arraySizeAttribute == null)Di2015NewLine      throw new InvalidOperationException("Missing ArraySizeAttribute on array.");Di2015NewLine    return GetTypeSize(fieldInfo.FieldType.GetElementType())*arraySizeAttribute.Length;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine    return GetTypeSize(fieldInfo.FieldType);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineInt32 GetTypeSize(Type type) {Di2015NewLine  if (type == typeof(Int32))Di2015NewLine    return 4;Di2015NewLine  else if (type == typeof(Boolean))Di2015NewLine    return 1;Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine    throw new InvalidOperationException("Unexpected type.");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3496403Di2015UniqueSeparatorSynchronizer
3496403Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Synchronizer : ISynchronizeInvokeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Thread m_Thread;Di2015NewLine    private BlockingCollection<Message> m_Queue = new BlockingCollection<Message>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Synchronizer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_Thread = new Thread(Run);Di2015NewLine        m_Thread.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine        m_Thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Run()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Message message = m_Queue.Take();Di2015NewLine            message.Return = message.Method.DynamicInvoke(message.Args);Di2015NewLine            message.Finished.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IAsyncResult BeginInvoke(Delegate method, object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Message message = new Message();Di2015NewLine        message.Method = method;Di2015NewLine        message.Args = args;Di2015NewLine        m_Queue.Add(message);Di2015NewLine        return message;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object EndInvoke(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Message message = result as Message;Di2015NewLine        if (message != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            message.Finished.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            return message.Return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("result");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Invoke(Delegate method, object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Message message = new Message();Di2015NewLine        message.Method = method;Di2015NewLine        message.Args = args;Di2015NewLine        m_Queue.Add(message);Di2015NewLine        message.Finished.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        return message.Return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool InvokeRequiredDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return Thread.CurrentThread != m_Thread; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class Message : IAsyncResultDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Delegate Method = null;Di2015NewLine        public object[] Args = null;Di2015NewLine        public object Return = null;Di2015NewLine        public object State = null;Di2015NewLine        public ManualResetEvent Finished = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object AsyncStateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return State; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public WaitHandle AsyncWaitHandleDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return Finished; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool CompletedSynchronouslyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return false; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsCompletedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return Finished.WaitOne(0); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3501555Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.ServiceModel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class CommunicationObjectExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void SafeClose(this ICommunicationObject communicationObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(communicationObject.State != CommunicationState.Opened)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            communicationObject.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(CommunicationException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            communicationObject.Abort();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(TimeoutException ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            communicationObject.Abort();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            communicationObject.Abort();Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static TResult SafeExecute<TServiceClient, TResult>(this TServiceClient communicationObject, Di2015NewLine        Func<TServiceClient, TResult> serviceAction)Di2015NewLine        where TServiceClient : ICommunicationObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var result = serviceAction.Invoke(communicationObject);Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        } // tryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            communicationObject.SafeClose();Di2015NewLine        } // finallyDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3501773Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void ReceiveCallback(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     var so = (StateObject)ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine     if (!so.Socket.Connected) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     tryDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         int read = so.Socket.EndReceive(ar);Di2015NewLine         if (read > 0)Di2015NewLine         ProcessBuffer(so, so.Buffer, read);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         so.Socket.BeginReceive(so.Buffer, 0, so.Buffer.Length, SocketFlags.None, ReceiveCallback, so);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (SocketException e)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          Trace.WriteLine("[Networking]::NetBase.ReceiveCallback: SocketException");Di2015NewLine          Output.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine          RaiseDisconnected();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (ObjectDisposedException e)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          Trace.WriteLine("[Networking]::NetBase.ReceiveCallback: ObjectDisposedException");Di2015NewLine          Output.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine          RaiseDisconnected();Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3504988Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string SmartTrim(this string text, int length)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (text == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("text");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (length < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (text.Length <= length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return text;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int lastSpaceBeforeMax = text.LastIndexOf(' ', length);Di2015NewLine    if (lastSpaceBeforeMax == -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Perhaps define a strategy here? Di2015NewLine        Quote,Di2015NewLine        Data,Di2015NewLine        NestedQuoteDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the   {Di2015NewLine        if (inputStream == null) Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("inputStream");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        reader = new StreamReader(inputStream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Reads a single line of CSV data.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Array of CSV fields</returns>Di2015NewLine    public string[] Read()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        var retval = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (line == null) Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var state = State.Initial;Di2015NewLine        var text = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var ch in line)Di2015NewLine            switch (state)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case State.Initial:Di2015NewLine                    if (ch == '"') Di2015NewLine                        state = State.Quote;Di2015NewLine                    else if (ch == ',') Di2015NewLine                        retval.Add(string.Empty);Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        text.Append(ch);Di2015NewLine                        state = State.Data;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case State.Data:Di2015NewLine                    if (ch == ',')Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        retval.Add(text.ToString());Di2015NewLine                        text.Length = 0;Di2015NewLine                        state = State.Initial;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else Di2015NewLine                        text.Append(ch);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case State.Quote:Di2015NewLine                    if (ch == '"')Di2015NewLine                        state = State.NestedQuote;Di2015NewLine                    else Di2015NewLine                        text.Append(ch);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                case State.NestedQuote:Di2015NewLine                    if (ch == '"')Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        text.Append('"');Di2015NewLine                        state = State.Quote;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    state = State.Data;Di2015NewLine                    goto case State.Data;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        retval.Add(text.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return retval.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        reader.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3512107Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<TEntity> WhereIn<TEntity, TValue>Di2015NewLine (Di2015NewLine     this ObjectQuery<TEntity> query, Di2015NewLine     Expression<Func<TEntity, TValue>> selector, Di2015NewLine     IEnumerable<TValue> collectionDi2015NewLine )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (selector == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("selector");Di2015NewLine    if (collection == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("collection");Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression p = selector.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!collection.Any()) return query;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Expression> equals = collection.Select(value => Di2015NewLine      (Expression)Expression.Equal(selector.Body, Di2015NewLine       Expression.Constant(value, typeof(TValue))));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Expression body = equals.Aggregate((accumulate, equal) => Di2015NewLine    Expression.Or(accumulate, equal));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return query.Where(Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntity, bool>>(body, p));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3513409Di2015UniqueSeparator    def combinations(n: Int, step: Int, distance: Int, sum: Int = 100): List[List[Int]] =Di2015NewLine      if (n == 1) Di2015NewLine        List(List(sum))Di2015NewLine      else Di2015NewLine        for {Di2015NewLine          first <- (step until sum by step).toListDi2015NewLine          rest <- combinations(n - 1, step, distance, sum - first)Di2015NewLine          if rest forall (x => (first - x).abs <= distance)Di2015NewLine        } yield first :: restDi2015NewLine

3518554Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Node FindFirstByBreadthFirst(this Node node, Predicate<Node> match)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var queue = new Queue<Node>();Di2015NewLine    queue.Enqueue(tree.RootNode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Take the next node from the front of the queueDi2015NewLine        var node = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Process the node 'node'Di2015NewLine        if (match(node))Di2015NewLine            return node;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the nodes children to the back of the queueDi2015NewLine        foreach (var child in node.Children)Di2015NewLine            queue.Enqueue(child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // None of the nodes matched the specified predicate.Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3518712Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate HashSet<EventHandler> _pausedHandlers = new HashSet<EventHandler>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic event EventHandler PausedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    add // will not add duplicatesDi2015NewLine    { _pausedHandlers.Add(value); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    removeDi2015NewLine    { _pausedHandlers.Remove(value); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3518712Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void OnPaused()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (EventHandler handler in _pausedHandlers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            handler(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // up to you what to do hereDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3518712Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Even though the code for FirstHandler and SecondHandler is the same,Di2015NewLine        // they will not (nor should they) be considered equal for the purposeDi2015NewLine        // of detecting duplicates.Di2015NewLine        EventHandler handler1 = FirstHandler;Di2015NewLine        EventHandler handler2 = SecondHandler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Since handler2 and handler3 point to the same method, on the otherDi2015NewLine        // hand, they will (and ought to) be treated as equal.Di2015NewLine        EventHandler handler3 = SecondHandler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // So this prints 'False'...Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(handler1.Equals(handler2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // ...and this prints 'True'.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(handler2.Equals(handler3));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now take a look at the code for SetAnonymousHandler below. TheDi2015NewLine        // method accepts an EventHandler by reference and compares it forDi2015NewLine        // equality to a delegate pointing to an anoymous lambda method. If theDi2015NewLine        // two are equal, it sets the EventHandler to this new delegate and Di2015NewLine        // returns true; otherwise it returns false.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This prints 'True', as handler1 is not equal to the delegateDi2015NewLine        // declared within the SetAnonymousHandler method.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(SetAnonymousHandler(ref handler1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // HOWEVER, now it prints 'False' for a simple reason: the delegate Di2015NewLine        // declared in SetAnonymousHandler points to an actual method. The factDi2015NewLine        // that it is an anonymous method simply means that the compilerDi2015NewLine        // automatically generates a "proper" method for it in IL (to see whatDi2015NewLine        // I mean, read the comment at the bottom of this class). So now,Di2015NewLine        // as with handler2 and handler3 above, handler1 and the delegateDi2015NewLine        // declared in SetAnonymousHandler point to the same method and areDi2015NewLine        // therefore equal; the method returns false.Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(SetAnonymousHandler(ref handler1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void FirstHandler(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Testing");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void SecondHandler(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Testing");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static bool SetAnonymousHandler(ref EventHandler handler)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EventHandler anonymous = (sender, e) => Console.WriteLine("Testing");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!handler.Equals(anonymous))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            handler = anonymous;Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Note: When the above method is compiled, the C# compiler generates codeDi2015NewLine    // that would look something like this if translated back from IL to C#Di2015NewLine    // (not exactly, but the point is just to illustrate that an anoymousDi2015NewLine    // method, after compilation, is really just like a "proper"Di2015NewLine    // -- i.e., non-anonymous -- method).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //static bool SetAnonymousHandler(ref EventHandler handler)Di2015NewLine    //{Di2015NewLine    //    EventHandler anonymous = SetAnonymousHandler_Anonymous;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //    if (handler.Equals(anonymous))Di2015NewLine    //    {Di2015NewLine    //        handler = anonymous;Di2015NewLine    //        return true;Di2015NewLine    //    }Di2015NewLine    //    elseDi2015NewLine    //    {Di2015NewLine    //        return false;Di2015NewLine    //    }Di2015NewLine    //}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //static void SetAnonymousHandler_Anonymous(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    //{Di2015NewLine    //    Console.WriteLine("Testing");Di2015NewLine    //}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3519403Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Thread> threads = new List<Thread>();Di2015NewLine        Thread thread;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            thread = new Thread(new ParameterizedThreadStart(CalculateResults));Di2015NewLine            thread.Start();Di2015NewLine            threads.Add(thread);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // wait for all threads to finishDi2015NewLine        for (int index = 0; index < threads.Count; index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            threads[index].Join();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void CalculateResults(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Thread number " + Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId + " is alive");Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Thread number " + Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId + " is closing");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3524511Di2015UniqueSeparator//Remove "this" if you don't want it to be a extension methodDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IList<T>> Chunks<T>(this IEnumerable<T> xs, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var curr = new List<T>(size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var x in xs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        curr.Add(x);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (curr.Count == size)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return curr;Di2015NewLine            curr = new List<T>(size);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3524511Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T[]> Chunks<T>(this IEnumerable<T> xs, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var curr = new T[size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var x in xs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        curr[i % size] = x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (++i % size == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return curr;Di2015NewLine            curr = new T[size];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3524511Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T[]> Chunks<T>(this IEnumerable<T> xs, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return xs.Select((x, i) => new { x, i })Di2015NewLine             .GroupBy(xi => xi.i / size, xi => xi.x)Di2015NewLine             .Select(g => g.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3525039Di2015UniqueSeparatorWriteXml

3525039Di2015UniqueSeparatorReadXml
3525039Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override void ReadXml(XmlReader reader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    reader.MoveToContent();Di2015NewLine    bool isEmptyElement = reader.IsEmptyElement;Di2015NewLine    reader.ReadStartElement();Di2015NewLine    if (isEmptyElement)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (XmlNodeType.EndElement != reader.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Bypass XmlNodeType.Whitespace, as found in XML filesDi2015NewLine        while (XmlNodeType.Element != reader.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (XmlNodeType.EndElement == reader.NodeType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                reader.ReadEndElement();Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            reader.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string key = reader.Name;Di2015NewLine        if (keyIsSubTree(key))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            storeSubtree(key, reader.ReadSubtree());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string value = reader.ReadElementString();Di2015NewLine            storeKeyValuePair(key, value ?? string.Empty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (XmlNodeType.EndElement == reader.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        reader.ReadEndElement();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3531294Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate delegate void AddMessageToConsole_DELEGATE (frmMainPresenter.PresenterMessages message); Di2015NewLineprivate void AddMessageToConsole (frmMainPresenter.PresenterMessages message) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine  if (InvokeRequired) Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // Invoke the target method, capturing the exception.Di2015NewLine    Exception ex = null;Di2015NewLine    Invoke((MethodInvoker)() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       tryDi2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine         AddMessageToConsole(message);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       catch (Exception error)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine         ex = error;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Handle error if it was thrownDi2015NewLine    if (ex != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      MSASession.ErrorLogger.Log(ex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Rethrow, preserving exception stackDi2015NewLine      throw ex.PrepareForRethrow();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  } Di2015NewLine  else Di2015NewLine  { Di2015NewLine    string message_text = ""; //Message that will be displayed in the Console / written in the Log. 3531677Di2015UniqueSeparator// you pass in a UserID (numeric), you get back a list of roles that user hasDi2015NewLinepublic List<string> GetRolesForUser(int userID)Di2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine   // SQL select statement - adjust as needed Di2015NewLine   string selectStmt = "SELECT Role FROM dbo.UserRole WHERE UserID = @YourUserID";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // create the resulting list of rolesDi2015NewLine   List<string> _allRoles = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // define SqlConnection and SqlCommand to grab the dataDi2015NewLine   using(SqlConnection _con = new SqlConnection('your connection string here'))Di2015NewLine   using(SqlCommand _cmd = new SqlCommand(selectStmt, _con))Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       // define the parameter for your SQL statement and fill the valueDi2015NewLine       _cmd.Parameters.Add("@YourUserID", SqlDbType.Int);Di2015NewLine       _cmd.Parameters["@YourUserID"].Value = userID;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       _con.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // create SqlDataReader to grab the rowsDi2015NewLine       using(SqlDataReader rdr = _cmd.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           // loop over all rows returned by SqlDataReaderDi2015NewLine           while(rdr.Read())Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              // grab the column no. 0 (corresponds to "Role" from yourDi2015NewLine              // SQL select statement) as a string, and store it into list of rolesDi2015NewLine              _allRoles.Add(rdr.GetString(0));Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine   }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return _allRoles;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3533543Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic bool isValid(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var data = File.ReadAllText(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var first = Regex.Match(data, @"\\A *(\\d+) +(\\d+) *([\\r\\n|\\n]|\\Z)");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!first.Success) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int width = int.Parse(first.Groups[1].Value);Di2015NewLine    int height = int.Parse(first.Groups[2].Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Regex.Match(data, @"\\A *\\d+ +\\d+ *((\\r\\n|\\n)((^ *| +)\\d+){" + width + @"} *){" + height + @"}\\Z", RegexOptions.Multiline).Success;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3534085Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IColumn GetColumnByPropertyName(string PropertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var c = Columns.SingleOrDefault(x => x.Name.Equals(PropertyName, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLine    if (c == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        c=Columns.SingleOrDefault(x => CleanUpColumnName(x.Name).Equals(PropertyName, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase));Di2015NewLine        if (c == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException("Couldn't find column name");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return c;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate string CleanUpColumnName(string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //don't forget to change Settings.ttinclude:CleanUp when changing this function! 3541022Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool Intersect(Rectangle rectangle1, Rectangle rectangle2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (((rectangle1.X < (rectangle2.X + rectangle2.Width)) && (rectangle2.X < (rectangle1.X + rectangle1.Width))) && (rectangle1.Y < (rectangle2.Y + rectangle2.Height)) && (rectangle2.Y < (rectangle1.Y + rectangle1.Height)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Vector2 rect1Centre = new Vector2(rectangle1.X + rectangle1.Width / 2, rectangle1.Y + rectangle1.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine            Vector2 rect2Centre = new Vector2(rectangle2.X + rectangle2.Width / 2, rectangle2.Y + rectangle1.Height / 2);Di2015NewLine            double radius1 = ((rectangle1.Width / 2) + (rectangle1.Height / 2)) / 2;Di2015NewLine            double radius2 = ((rectangle2.Width / 2) + (rectangle2.Height / 2)) / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double widthTri = rect1Centre.X - rect2Centre.X;Di2015NewLine            double heightTri = rect1Centre.Y - rect2Centre.Y;Di2015NewLine            double distance = Math.Sqrt(Math.Pow(widthTri, 2) + Math.Pow(heightTri, 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (distance <= (radius1 + radius2))Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3546220Di2015UniqueSeparator    MethodInfo countMethodInfo = typeof (System.Linq.Enumerable).GetMethods().Single(Di2015NewLine        method => method.Name == "Count" && method.IsStatic && method.GetParameters().Length == 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] properties = typeof(MyCollections).GetProperties();Di2015NewLine    foreach (PropertyInfo property in properties)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type propertyType = property.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine        if (propertyType.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type genericType = propertyType.GetGenericTypeDefinition();Di2015NewLine            if (genericType == typeof(IEnumerable<>))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // access the collection propertyDi2015NewLine                object collection = property.GetValue(obj, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // access the type of the generic collectionDi2015NewLine                Type genericArgument = propertyType.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // make a generic method call for System.Linq.Enumerable.Count<> for the type of this collectionDi2015NewLine                MethodInfo localCountMethodInfo = countMethodInfo.MakeGenericMethod(genericArgument);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // invoke Count method (this fails)Di2015NewLine                object count = localCountMethodInfo.Invoke(null, new object[] {collection});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", genericArgument.Name, count);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3548472Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring path = @"C:\\Foo\\Bar"; // your path goes hereDi2015NewLinevar dirInfo = new DirectoryInfo(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// DirectoryInfo.GetFiles() returns an array of FileInfo[]Di2015NewLine// FileInfo's Name property gives us the file's name without the full pathDi2015NewLine// LINQ let statement stores the split result, splitting the filename on spacesDi2015NewLine// and dots to get the objectName, and Guid separated from the file extension.Di2015NewLine// The "select new" projects the results into an anonymous type with the specifiedDi2015NewLine// properties and respectively assigned values. I stored the fullpath just in case.Di2015NewLinevar query = from f in dirInfo.GetFiles("*.xml")Di2015NewLine            let split = f.Name.Split(new[] { ' ', '.' })Di2015NewLine            select new Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ObjectName = split[0],Di2015NewLine                Guid = split[1],Di2015NewLine                FileName = f.FullNameDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now that the above query has neatly separated the ObjectName, we use LINQDi2015NewLine// to group by ObjectName (the group key). Multiple files may exist under the sameDi2015NewLine// key so we then select the First item from each group.Di2015NewLinevar results = query.GroupBy(o => o.ObjectName)Di2015NewLine                   .Select(g => g.First());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Iterate over the results using the projected property names.Di2015NewLineforeach (var item in results)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(item.FileName);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("ObjectName: {0} -- Guid {1}", item.ObjectName, item.Guid);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3550208Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass GeneralCacheDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<Type, ICacheCollection> _collections;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GeneralCache()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _collections = new Dictionary<Type, ICacheCollection>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T GetOrAddItem<T>(int id, Func<int, T> factory) where T : EntityBaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type t = typeof(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ICacheCollection collection;Di2015NewLine        if (!_collections.TryGetValue(t, out collection))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            collection = _collections[t] = new CacheCollection<T>(factory);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CacheCollection<T> stronglyTyped = (CacheCollection<T>)collection;Di2015NewLine        return stronglyTyped.Item(id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3550208Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CacheCollection<T> : List<CacheItem<T>>, ICacheCollection where T : EntityBaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Func<int, T> _factory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CacheCollection(Func<int, T> factory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _factory = factory;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Here you can define the Item method to return a more specific typeDi2015NewLine    // than is required by the ICacheCollection interface. This is accomplishedDi2015NewLine    // by defining the interface explicitly below.Di2015NewLine    public T Item(int id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Note: use FirstOrDefault, as First will throw an exceptionDi2015NewLine        // if the item does not exist.Di2015NewLine        CacheItem<T> result = this.Where(t => t.Entity.Id == id)Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (result == null) //item not yet in cache, load it!Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T entity = _factory(id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Note: it looks like you forgot to instantiate your result variableDi2015NewLine            // in this case.Di2015NewLine            result = new CacheItem<T>(entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Add(result);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result.Entity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Here you are explicitly implementing the ICacheCollection interface;Di2015NewLine    // this effectively hides the interface's signature for this method whileDi2015NewLine    // exposing another signature with a more specific return type.Di2015NewLine    EntityBase ICacheCollection.Item(int id)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This calls the public version of the method.Di2015NewLine        return Item(id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
