3550804Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RegistryKey key = Registry.LocalMachine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Traverse(key, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        key.Close();Di2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Traverse(RegistryKey key, int indent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(key.Name);Di2015NewLine        string[] names = key.GetSubKeyNames();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var subkeyname in names)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string[] valnames = key.GetValueNames();Di2015NewLine                foreach (string valname in valnames)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(returnIndentions(indent)+valname + ":" + key.GetValue(valname));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Traverse(key.OpenSubKey(subkeyname),indent++);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch { Di2015NewLine            //do nothingDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string returnIndentions(int indent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string indentions = "";Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < indent; i++) {Di2015NewLine            indentions += " ";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return indentions;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3553409Di2015UniqueSeparatorSubject<Item> toAddObservable;Di2015NewLineListObservable<Item> buffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Init()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Subjects are an IObservable we can trigger by-hand, they're the Di2015NewLine    // mutable variables of RxDi2015NewLine    toAddObservable = new Subject(Scheduler.TaskPool);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ListObservable will hold all our items until someone asks for themDi2015NewLine    // It will yield exactly *one* item, but only when toAddObservableDi2015NewLine    // is completed.Di2015NewLine    buffer = new ListObservable<Item>(toAddObservable);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Add(Item to_add)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    lock (this) {Di2015NewLine        // Subjects themselves are thread-safe, but we still need the lockDi2015NewLine        // to protect against the reset in FetchResultsDi2015NewLine        ToAddOnAnotherThread.OnNext(to_add);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<Item> FetchResults()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Item> ret = null;Di2015NewLine    buffer.Subscribe(x => ret = x);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    lock (this) {Di2015NewLine        toAddObservable.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine        Init();     // Recreate everythingDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3553674Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.DirectoryServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Gets the list of AD groups that a user belongs toDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="loginName">The login name of the user (domain\\login or login)</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>A comma delimited list of the user's AD groups</returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static SortedList GetADGroups(string loginName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(loginName))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("The loginName should not be empty");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SortedList ADGroups = new SortedList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int backSlash = loginName.IndexOf("\\\\");Di2015NewLine    string userName = backSlash > 0 ? loginName.Substring(backSlash + 1) : loginName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DirectoryEntry directoryEntry = new DirectoryEntry();Di2015NewLine    DirectorySearcher directorySearcher = new DirectorySearcher(directoryEntry, "(sAMAccountName=" + userName + ")");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SearchResult searchResult = directorySearcher.FindOne();Di2015NewLine    if (null != searchResult)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DirectoryEntry userADEntry = new DirectoryEntry(searchResult.Path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Invoke Groups method.Di2015NewLine        object userADGroups = userADEntry.Invoke("Groups");Di2015NewLine        foreach (object obj in (IEnumerable)userADGroups)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Create object for each group.Di2015NewLine            DirectoryEntry groupDirectoryEntry = new DirectoryEntry(obj);Di2015NewLine            string groupName = groupDirectoryEntry.Name.Replace("cn=", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine            groupName = groupName.Replace("CN=", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine            if (!ADGroups.ContainsKey(groupName))Di2015NewLine                ADGroups.Add(groupName, groupName);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ADGroups;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3553821Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class WorkerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Thread[] _threads;Di2015NewLine    private readonly object _locker = new object();Di2015NewLine    private readonly TimeSpan _tooFastSuspensionSpan;Di2015NewLine    private DateTime _lastSuspensionTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Worker(int numThreads, TimeSpan tooFastSuspensionSpan)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _tooFastSuspensionSpan = tooFastSuspensionSpan;Di2015NewLine        _threads = Enumerable.Repeat(new ThreadStart(DoWork), numThreads)Di2015NewLine                             .Select(ts => new Thread(ts))Di2015NewLine                             .ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Run()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var thread in _threads)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            thread.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void DoWork()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (!IsWorkComplete())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Do work hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (TooFastException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SuspendAll();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SuspendAll()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_locker)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // We don't want N near-simultaneous failures causing a sleep-duration of N * _tooFastSuspensionSpanDi2015NewLine            // 1 second is arbitrary. We can't be deterministic about it since we are forcefully suspending threadsDi2015NewLine            var now = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            if (now.Subtract(_lastSuspensionTime) < _tooFastSuspensionSpan + TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1))Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _lastSuspensionTime = now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var otherThreads = _threads.Where(t => t.ManagedThreadId != Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var otherThread in otherThreads)Di2015NewLine                otherThread.Suspend();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(_tooFastSuspensionSpan);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var otherThread in otherThreads)Di2015NewLine                otherThread.Resume();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3556973Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FormatterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  List<char> symbols;Di2015NewLine  int base;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Formatter(string format)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string[] splitted = format.Split(",");Di2015NewLine    symbols = splitted.Select(x => x[0]).ToList();Di2015NewLine    base = symbols.Size;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public long Parse(string value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    long result = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach(char c in value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      long n = symbols.IndexOf(c);Di2015NewLine      result = result*base+n;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public string Encode(long value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    while(value>0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      long n = value % base;Di2015NewLine      value /= base;Di2015NewLine      sb.Insert(0, symbols[n]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3558102Di2015UniqueSeparator/* Create the stored procedure */Di2015NewLinecreate procedure ParseXML (@InputXML xml)Di2015NewLineasDi2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine    declare @MyTable table (Di2015NewLine        id int,Di2015NewLine        value intDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    insert into @MyTable Di2015NewLine        (id, value)Di2015NewLine        select Row.id.value('@id','int'), Row.id.value('@value','int') Di2015NewLine            from @InputXML.nodes('/Rows/Row') as Row(id)        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    select id, valueDi2015NewLine        from @MyTableDi2015NewLineendDi2015NewLinegoDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* Create the XML Parameter */Di2015NewLinedeclare @XMLParam xmlDi2015NewLineset @XMLParam = '<Rows>Di2015NewLine                     <Row id="1" value="100" />Di2015NewLine                     <Row id="2" value="200" />Di2015NewLine                     <Row id="3" value="300" />Di2015NewLine                 </Rows>'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* Call the stored procedure with the XML Parameter */Di2015NewLineexec ParseXML @InputXML = @XMLParamDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* Clean up - Drop the procedure */Di2015NewLinedrop procedure ParseXMLDi2015NewLinegoDi2015NewLine
3558122Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DataConcierge<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // *************************Di2015NewLine    // Simple save functionalityDi2015NewLine    // *************************Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Save(T dataObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // perform save logicDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.OnSaved(dataObject);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event DataObjectSaved<T> Saved;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void OnSaved(T dataObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var saved = this.Saved;Di2015NewLine        if (saved != null)Di2015NewLine            saved(this, new DataObjectEventArgs<T>(dataObject));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ************************Di2015NewLine    // Batch save functionalityDi2015NewLine    // ************************Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<BatchToken, List<T>> _BatchSavedDataObjects = new Dictionary<BatchToken, List<T>>();Di2015NewLine    System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim _BatchSavedDataObjectsLock = new System.Threading.ReaderWriterLockSlim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int _SavedObjectThreshold = 17; // if the number of objects being stored for a batch reaches this threshold, then those objects are to be cleared from the list.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BatchToken BeginSave()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // create a batch token to represent this batchDi2015NewLine        BatchToken token = new BatchToken();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _BatchSavedDataObjectsLock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _BatchSavedDataObjects.Add(token, new List<T>());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _BatchSavedDataObjectsLock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return token;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void EndSave(BatchToken token)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<T> batchSavedDataObjects;Di2015NewLine        _BatchSavedDataObjectsLock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_BatchSavedDataObjects.TryGetValue(token, out batchSavedDataObjects))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("The BatchToken is expired or invalid.", "token");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.OnBatchSaved(batchSavedDataObjects); // this causes a single BatchSaved event to be firedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!_BatchSavedDataObjects.Remove(token))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("The BatchToken is expired or invalid.", "token");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _BatchSavedDataObjectsLock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Save(BatchToken token, T dataObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<T> batchSavedDataObjects;Di2015NewLine        // the read lock prevents EndSave from executing before this Save method has a chance to finish executingDi2015NewLine        _BatchSavedDataObjectsLock.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!_BatchSavedDataObjects.TryGetValue(token, out batchSavedDataObjects))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("The BatchToken is expired or invalid.", "token");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // perform save logicDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.OnBatchSaved(batchSavedDataObjects, dataObject);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _BatchSavedDataObjectsLock.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event BatchDataObjectSaved<T> BatchSaved;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void OnBatchSaved(List<T> batchSavedDataObjects)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (batchSavedDataObjects)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var batchSaved = this.BatchSaved;Di2015NewLine            if (batchSaved != null)Di2015NewLine                batchSaved(this, new BatchDataObjectEventArgs<T>(batchSavedDataObjects));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void OnBatchSaved(List<T> batchSavedDataObjects, T savedDataObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // add the data object to the list storing the data objects that have been saved for this batchDi2015NewLine        lock (batchSavedDataObjects)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            batchSavedDataObjects.Add(savedDataObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if the threshold has been reachedDi2015NewLine            if (_SavedObjectThreshold > 0 && batchSavedDataObjects.Count >= _SavedObjectThreshold)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // then raise the BatchSaved event with the data objects that we currently haveDi2015NewLine                var batchSaved = this.BatchSaved;Di2015NewLine                if (batchSaved != null)Di2015NewLine                    batchSaved(this, new BatchDataObjectEventArgs<T>(batchSavedDataObjects.ToArray()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // and clear the list to ensure that we are not holding on to the data objects unnecessarilyDi2015NewLine                batchSavedDataObjects.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass BatchTokenDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static int _LastId = 0;Di2015NewLine    static object _IdLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int GetNextId()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_IdLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ++_LastId;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BatchToken()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Id = GetNextId();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Id { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass DataObjectEventArgs<T> : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T DataObject { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataObjectEventArgs(T dataObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.DataObject = dataObject;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedelegate void DataObjectSaved<T>(object sender, DataObjectEventArgs<T> e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass BatchDataObjectEventArgs<T> : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<T> DataObjects { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BatchDataObjectEventArgs(IEnumerable<T> dataObjects)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.DataObjects = dataObjects;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedelegate void BatchDataObjectSaved<T>(object sender, BatchDataObjectEventArgs<T> e);Di2015NewLine

3558260Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Flatten(this IEnumerable elems, string separator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (elems == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (object elem in elems)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (sb.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(separator);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sb.Append(elem);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3560232Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<Point> GetPoints(Matrix matrix, int[] indexes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (indexes.Length == matrix.Rank)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return matrix.GetValue(indexes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < matrix.GetRankSize(indexes.Length); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var point inDi2015NewLine                GetPoints(matrix, indexes.Concat(new int[] { i }).ToArray())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return point;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3560482Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic public void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<List<int>> list = new List<List<int>>(){Di2015NewLine      new List<int>() {0 ,1 ,2, 3, 4, 5, 6 },Di2015NewLine      new List<int>() {0 ,1 ,2, 3, 4, 5, 6 },Di2015NewLine      new List<int>() {0 ,1 ,4, 2, 4, 5, 6 },Di2015NewLine      new List<int>() {0 ,3 ,2, 5, 1, 6, 4 }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    var hashList = list.Select((l, ind) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        uint hash = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < l.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uint el = (uint)l[i];Di2015NewLine            hash ^= (el << i) | (el >> (32 - i));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new {hash, ind};Di2015NewLine    }).OrderBy(l => l.hash).ToList();Di2015NewLine    //hashList.Sort();Di2015NewLine    uint prevHash = hashList[0].hash;Di2015NewLine    int firstInd = 0;            Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i <= hashList.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (i == hashList.Count || hashList[i].hash != prevHash)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int n = firstInd; n < i; n++)Di2015NewLine                for (int m = n + 1; m < i; m++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    List<int> x = list[hashList[n].ind];Di2015NewLine                    List<int> y = list[hashList[m].ind];Di2015NewLine                    if (x.Count == y.Count && x.SequenceEqual(y))Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Dupes: {0} and {1}", hashList[n].ind, hashList[m].ind);Di2015NewLine                }                    Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (i == hashList.Count)Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        if (hashList[i].hash != prevHash)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            firstInd = i;Di2015NewLine            prevHash = hashList[i].hash;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3564213Di2015UniqueSeparator// purely an example, chances are this will have actual, y'know logic in liveDi2015NewLinepublic class DateRangeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<DateTime> dates = new List<DateTime>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(DateTime date)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.dates.Add(date);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<DateTime> DatesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.dates; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<DateRange> GetRanges(this IList<DateTime> dates)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<DateRange> ranges = new List<DateRange>();Di2015NewLine    DateRange currentRange = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this presumes a list of dates ordered by day, if not then the list will need sorting firstDi2015NewLine    for( int i = 0; i < dates.Count; ++i )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var currentDate = dates[i];Di2015NewLine        if( i == 0 || dates[i - 1] != currentDate.AddDays(-1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // it's either the first date or the current date isn't consecutive to the previous so a new range is neededDi2015NewLine            currentRange = new DateRange();Di2015NewLine            ranges.Add(currentRange);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        currentRange.Add(currentDate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ranges;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3564213Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<DateTime>
3564213Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<DateRange> GetRanges(this IEnumerable<DateTime> dates)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<DateRange> ranges = new List<DateRange>();Di2015NewLine    DateRange currentRange = null;Di2015NewLine    DateTime? previousDate = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this presumes a list of dates ordered by day, if not then the list will need sorting firstDi2015NewLine    foreach( var currentDate in dates )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if( previousDate == null || previousDate.Value != currentDate.AddDays(-1) )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // it's either the first date or the current date isn't consecutive to the previous so a new range is neededDi2015NewLine            currentRange = new DateRange();Di2015NewLine            ranges.Add(currentRange);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        currentRange.Add(currentDate);Di2015NewLine        previousDate = currentDate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ranges;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

filter the treeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    filterEntry = new Gtk.Entry ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Fire off an event when the text in the Entry changesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    filterEntry.Changed += OnFilterEntryTextChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a nice label describing the ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a box to hold the Entry and TreeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Gtk.VBox box = new Gtk.VBox ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the widgets to the boxDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    box.PackStart (filterBox, false, false, 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    box.PackStart (tv, true, true, 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    window.Add (box);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //setting up columns and renderersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Gtk.TreeViewColumn nameColumn = new Gtk.TreeViewColumn{Title="Name"}; true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Gtk.TreeViewColumn emailColumn = new Gtk.TreeViewColumn {Title="Email"}; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Gtk.CellRendererText emailCell = new Gtk.CellRendererText ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    emailColumn.PackStart (emailCell, 3568537Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool TryDequeue(out Tasks task)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  task = null;Di2015NewLine  lock (this.tasks) {Di2015NewLine    if (0 < tasks.Count) {Di2015NewLine      task = tasks.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if (null == task) {Di2015NewLine    Log.Trace ("Queue was empty");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return null != task;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
3568537Di2015UniqueSeparatorEnqueue()
3568537Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ConcurrentQueue<T>:IEnumerable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    volatile bool fFinished = false;Di2015NewLine    ManualResetEvent eventAdded = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    private Queue<T> queue = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine    private object syncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SetFinished()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fFinished = true;Di2015NewLine            eventAdded.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Enqueue(T t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert (false == fFinished);Di2015NewLine        lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            queue.Enqueue(t);Di2015NewLine            eventAdded.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool Dequeue(out T t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (syncRoot)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (0 < queue.Count)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    t = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (false == fFinished)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    eventAdded.Reset ();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (false == fFinished)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                eventAdded.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } while (true);Di2015NewLine        t = default(T);Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T t;Di2015NewLine        while (Dequeue(out t))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return t;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3571027Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass YouTubeScraperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public HtmlNode FindObjectElement(string url)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HtmlNodeCollection scriptNodes = FindScriptNodes(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < scriptNodes.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HtmlNode scriptNode = scriptNodes[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string javascript = scriptNode.InnerHtml;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int objectNodeLocation = javascript.IndexOf("<object");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (objectNodeLocation != -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string htmlStart = javascript.Substring(objectNodeLocation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int objectNodeEndLocation = htmlStart.IndexOf(">\\" :");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (objectNodeEndLocation != -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string finalEscapedHtml = htmlStart.Substring(0, objectNodeEndLocation + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    string unescaped = Unescape(finalEscapedHtml);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    var objectDoc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    objectDoc.LoadHtml(unescaped);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    HtmlNode objectNode = objectDoc.GetElementbyId("movie_player");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return objectNode;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HtmlNode FindEmbedElement(string url)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HtmlNodeCollection scriptNodes = FindScriptNodes(url);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < scriptNodes.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HtmlNode scriptNode = scriptNodes[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string javascript = scriptNode.InnerHtml;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int approxEmbedNodeLocation = javascript.IndexOf("<\\\\/object>\\" : \\"<embed");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (approxEmbedNodeLocation != -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string htmlStart = javascript.Substring(approxEmbedNodeLocation + 15);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int embedNodeEndLocation = htmlStart.IndexOf(">\\";");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (embedNodeEndLocation != -1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string finalEscapedHtml = htmlStart.Substring(0, embedNodeEndLocation + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    string unescaped = Unescape(finalEscapedHtml);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    var embedDoc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    embedDoc.LoadHtml(unescaped);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    HtmlNode videoEmbedNode = embedDoc.GetElementbyId("movie_player");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return videoEmbedNode;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected HtmlNodeCollection FindScriptNodes(string url)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var doc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WebRequest request = WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine        using (var response = request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine        using (var stream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            doc.Load(stream);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HtmlNode root = doc.DocumentNode;Di2015NewLine        HtmlNodeCollection scriptNodes = root.SelectNodes("//script");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return scriptNodes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static string Unescape(string htmlFromJavascript)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The JavaScript has escaped all of its HTML using backslashes. We needDi2015NewLine        // to reverse this.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // DISCLAIMER: I am a TOTAL Regex n00b; I make no claims as to the robustnessDi2015NewLine        // of this code. If you could improve it, please, I beg of you to do so. Personally,Di2015NewLine        // I tested it on a grand total of three inputs. It worked for those, at least.Di2015NewLine        return Regex.Replace(htmlFromJavascript, @"\\\\(.)", UnescapeFromBeginning);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static string UnescapeFromBeginning(Match match)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string text = match.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (text.StartsWith("\\\\"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return text.Substring(1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return text;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3578759Di2015UniqueSeparatorCreatePerson<T>()
3578759Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PersonFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Person CreatePerson()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Person();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Employee CreateEmployee()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Employee();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Pilot CreatePilot()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Pilot();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T CreatePerson<T>()Di2015NewLine        where T : PersonDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)CreatePerson(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Person CreatePerson(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (type == typeof(Person))Di2015NewLine            return CreatePerson();Di2015NewLine        else if (type == typeof(Employee))Di2015NewLine            return CreateEmployee();Di2015NewLine        else if (type == typeof(Pilot))Di2015NewLine            return CreatePilot();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(string.Format(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, "Unrecognized type [{0}]", type.FullName), "type");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Person CreatePerson(string typeOfPerson)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (typeOfPerson)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "Employee":Di2015NewLine                return CreateEmployee();Di2015NewLine            case "Pilot":Di2015NewLine                return CreatePilot();Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return CreateEmployee();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass UsageExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Person GetPerson()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Pilot p;Di2015NewLine        p = (Pilot)PersonFactory.CreatePerson("Pilot"); // this code already knows to expect a Pilot, so why not just call CreatePilot or CreatePerson<Pilot>()?Di2015NewLine        p = PersonFactory.CreatePilot();Di2015NewLine        p = PersonFactory.CreatePerson<Pilot>();Di2015NewLine        return p;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Person GetPerson(Type personType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Person p = PersonFactory.CreatePerson(personType);Di2015NewLine        // this code can't know what type of person was just created, because it depends on the parameterDi2015NewLine        return p;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void KnowledgableCaller()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type personType = typeof(Pilot);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Person p = this.GetPerson(typeof(Pilot));Di2015NewLine        // this code knows that the Person object just returned should be of type PilotDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Pilot pilot = (Pilot)p;Di2015NewLine        // proceed with accessing Pilot-specific functionalityDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void IgnorantCaller()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Person p = this.GetPerson();Di2015NewLine        // this caller doesn't know what type of Person object was just returnedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // but it can perform tests to figure it outDi2015NewLine        Pilot pilot = p as Pilot;Di2015NewLine        if (pilot != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // proceed with accessing Pilot-specific functionalityDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3579499Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T MapStruct<T>(XmlRpcStruct xmlRpcStruct) where T : class, new()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (T)MapStructInternal(typeof(T), xmlRpcStruct);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static object MapStructInternal(Type t, XmlRpcStruct xmlRpcStruct)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object map = t.GetConstructor(new Type[0] ).Invoke(new object[0]);Di2015NewLine    foreach (DictionaryEntry entry in xmlRpcStruct)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlRpcStruct entryStruct = (XmlRpcStruct)entry.Value;Di2015NewLine        foreach (DictionaryEntry subEntry in entryStruct)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (subEntry.Value.GetType() != typeof(XmlRpcStruct))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var prop = map.GetType().GetField(subEntry.Key.ToString());Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(map, subEntry.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var prop = map.GetType().GetField(subEntry.Key.ToString());Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(map, MapStructInternal(map.GetType(),(XmlRpcStruct)subEntry.Value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return map;Di2015NewLine}    Di2015NewLine

3579900Di2015UniqueSeparator    // Iterate all browsers and record the detailsDi2015NewLine    IntPtr hWnd = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    NativeWIN32.EnumChildWindows(hWnd, new NativeWIN32.Win32Callback(BrowserEnumCallback), hWnd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Called back for each IE browser.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="hWnd"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="lParam"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    static bool BrowserEnumCallback(IntPtr hWnd, IntPtr lParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Is this app IE?Di2015NewLine        if (NativeWIN32.GetClassName(hWnd) == "IEFrame")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If this is a new browser, add itDi2015NewLine            if (!BrowserWindows.ContainsKey(hWnd))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Record the BrowserDi2015NewLine                BrowserWindow browser = new BrowserWindow()Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    hWnd = hWndDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                // Store the browser in the temp list and temp memberDi2015NewLine                TempCurrentBrowser = browser;Di2015NewLine                BrowserWindows.Add(hWnd, browser);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Store the browser in the temp list and temp memberDi2015NewLine                TempCurrentBrowser = BrowserWindows[hWnd];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            TempCurrentBrowser.WindowText = NativeWIN32.GetWindowText(hWnd);Di2015NewLine            TempCurrentBrowser.Found = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Now that we know it is a browser, look for tabbed windows and address barDi2015NewLine            NativeWIN32.EnumChildWindows(hWnd, new NativeWIN32.Win32Callback(BrowserEnumChildrenCallback), hWnd);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Called back for each child window in the browserDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="hWnd"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="lParam"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    static bool BrowserEnumChildrenCallback(IntPtr hWnd, IntPtr lParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string classname = NativeWIN32.GetClassName(hWnd);Di2015NewLine        switch (classname)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // This is the main address barDi2015NewLine            case "Edit":Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string url = NativeWIN32.GetWindowText(hWnd);Di2015NewLine                    if (url.StartsWith(@"http://") || url.StartsWith(@"https://") || url.StartsWith("about:"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        TempCurrentBrowser.Url = url;Di2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case "ComboBoxEx32":Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string url = NativeWIN32.GetWindowText(hWnd);Di2015NewLine                    if (url.StartsWith(@"http://") || url.StartsWith(@"https://") || url.StartsWith("about:"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        TempCurrentBrowser.Url = url;Di2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Record any sub pages still active, by title to avoid revisiting popupDi2015NewLine            // If this name matches the name of the browser, it is the current windowDi2015NewLine            // If so, record the browser url for reference in that tab windowDi2015NewLine            case "TabWindowClass":Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string title = NativeWIN32.GetWindowText(hWnd);Di2015NewLine                    BrowserTabWindow tabWindow;Di2015NewLine                    if (!TempCurrentBrowser.TabWindows.ContainsKey(hWnd))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Create a new tabbed window for the current browserDi2015NewLine                        tabWindow = new BrowserTabWindow()Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            hWnd = hWndDi2015NewLine                        };Di2015NewLine                        TempCurrentBrowser.TabWindows.Add(hWnd, tabWindow);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        tabWindow = TempCurrentBrowser.TabWindows[hWnd];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    tabWindow.WindowText = title;Di2015NewLine                    tabWindow.Found = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3585520Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Element Load(int id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var db = DataContextFactory.Create<ElementContext>())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var translations = from t in db.TranslationsDi2015NewLine                           where t.Fk_Element_Id == idDi2015NewLine                           join l in db.Languages on t.FK_Language_Id equals l.IdDi2015NewLine                           select new Translation(t, l);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new Element(db.Elements.Where(x => x.Id == id).Single(), translations);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3585664Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.Entity;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.Entity.ModelConfiguration;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace EFTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class RequestBaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public DateTime? RequestedDate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int UserId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MissionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public virtual ICollection<MissionRequest> MissionRequests { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ColumnDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MissionRequest : RequestBaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public virtual Mission Mission { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ShiftRequest : RequestBaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Column Column { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TestContext : DbContextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public DbSet<RequestBase> Requests { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public DbSet<Mission> Missions { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnModelCreating(ModelBuilder modelBuilder)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            modelBuilder.ContainerName = "EFTest";Di2015NewLine            modelBuilder.IncludeMetadataInDatabase = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Example of complex type mapping. First you have to define Di2015NewLine            // complex type. Than you can access type properties in  Di2015NewLine            // MapHiearchy.Di2015NewLine            var columnType = modelBuilder.ComplexType<Column>();Di2015NewLine            columnType.Property(c => c.Name).HasMaxLength(50);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            modelBuilder.Entity<Mission>()Di2015NewLine                .Property(m => m.Id)Di2015NewLine                .IsIdentity();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            modelBuilder.Entity<Mission>()Di2015NewLine                .HasKey(m => m.Id)Di2015NewLine                .MapSingleType(m => new { m.Id, m.Name })Di2015NewLine                .ToTable("dbo.Missions");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            modelBuilder.Entity<RequestBase>()Di2015NewLine                .Property(r => r.Id)Di2015NewLine                .IsIdentity();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // You map multiple entities to single table. You have to  Di2015NewLine            // add some discriminator to differ entity type in the table. Di2015NewLine            modelBuilder.Entity<RequestBase>()Di2015NewLine                .HasKey(r => r.Id)Di2015NewLine                .MapHierarchy()Di2015NewLine                .Case<RequestBase>(r => new { r.Id, r.RequestedDate, r.UserId, Discriminator = 0 })Di2015NewLine                .Case<MissionRequest>(m => new { MissionId = m.Mission.Id, Discriminator = 1 })Di2015NewLine                .Case<ShiftRequest>(s => new { ColumnName = s.Column.Name, Discriminator = 2 })Di2015NewLine                .ToTable("dbo.Requests");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3586745Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MyExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T FirstOrDefaultFromMany<T>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> childrenSelector,Di2015NewLine        Predicate<T> condition)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // return default if no itemsDi2015NewLine        if(source == null || !source.Any()) return default(T);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // return result if found and stop traversing hierarchyDi2015NewLine        var attempt = source.FirstOrDefault(t => condition(t));Di2015NewLine        if(!Equals(attempt,default(T))) return attempt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // recursively call this function on lower levels of theDi2015NewLine        // hierarchy until a match is found or the hierarchy is exhaustedDi2015NewLine        return source.SelectMany(childrenSelector)Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefaultFromMany(childrenSelector, condition);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

ReverseBitsWith4Operations(byte b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (byte)(((b * 0x80200802ul) & 0x0884422110ul) * 0x0101010101ul >> 32);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static byte ReverseBitsWith7Operations(byte b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (byte)(((b * 0x0802u & 0x22110u) | (b * 0x8020u & 0x88440u)) * 0x10101u >> 16);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static byte ReverseBitsWithLoop(byte v)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte r = v; // r will be reversed bits of v; first get LSB of vDi2015NewLine    int s = 7; // extra shift needed at endDi2015NewLine    for (v >>= 1; v != 0; v >>= 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        r <<= 1;Di2015NewLine        r |= (byte)(v & 1);Di2015NewLine        s--;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    r <<= s; // shift when v's highest bits are zeroDi2015NewLine    return r;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static byte ReverseWithUnrolledLoop(byte b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte r = b;Di2015NewLine    b >>= 1;Di2015NewLine    r <<= 1;Di2015NewLine    r |= (byte)(b & 1);Di2015NewLine    b >>= 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    r <<= 1;Di2015NewLine    r |= (byte)(b & 1);Di2015NewLine    b >>= 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    r <<= 1;Di2015NewLine    r |= (byte)(b & 1);Di2015NewLine    b >>= 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    r <<= 1;Di2015NewLine    r |= (byte)(b & 1);Di2015NewLine    b >>= 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    r <<= 1;Di2015NewLine    r |= (byte)(b & 1);Di2015NewLine    b >>= 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    r <<= 1;Di2015NewLine    r |= (byte)(b & 1);Di2015NewLine    b >>= 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    r <<= 1;Di2015NewLine    r |= (byte)(b & 1);Di2015NewLine    b >>= 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return r;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3596369Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic RNGCryptoServiceProvider provider = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static byte[] GetBytes() {Di2015NewLine        byte[] box = new byte[1];Di2015NewLine        do provider.GetBytes(box);Di2015NewLine        while (!(box[0] < n * (Byte.MaxValue / n)));Di2015NewLine        return box;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static IList<T> InnerLoop(int n, IList<T> list) {Di2015NewLine        var box = GetBytes(n);Di2015NewLine        int k = (box[0] % n);Di2015NewLine        T value = list[k];Di2015NewLine        list[k] = list[n];Di2015NewLine        list[n] = value;Di2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Shuffle<T>(this IList<T> list)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int n = list.Count;Di2015NewLine    while (n > 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list = InnerLoop(n, list);Di2015NewLine        n--;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3599709Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool _CheckFileName(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach(ListViewItem item in this.myListView.Items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this is the code when all your subitems are file names - if an item contains only one subitem which is a filename,Di2015NewLine        // then you can just against that subitem, which is better in terms of performanceDi2015NewLine        foreach(ListViewItem.ListViewSubItem subItem in item.SubItems)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // you might want to ignore the letter caseDi2015NewLine            if(String.Equals(fileName, subItem.Text))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing(var ofd = new OpenFileDialog())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // ... setup the dialog ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(ofd.ShowDialog() == DialogResult.Cancel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // cancelDi2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // note that FileOpenDialog.FileName will give you the absolute path of the file; if you want only the file name, you should use Path.GetFileName()Di2015NewLine    if(!_CheckFileName(ofd.FileName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // file already addedDi2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // we're cool...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3599966Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class HierarchyGeneratorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<int> levels = new List<int> { 1 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DownOneLevel()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        levels.Add(1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void UpLevels(int numLevels)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (levels.Count < numLevels + 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine                "Attempt to ascend beyond the top level.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < numLevels; i++)Di2015NewLine            levels.RemoveAt(levels.Count - 1);Di2015NewLine        MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void MoveNext()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        levels[levels.Count - 1]++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string CurrentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new string(' ', (levels.Count - 1) * 2)Di2015NewLine                 + string.Join(".", levels.Select(l => l.ToString()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic partial class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var hg = new HierarchyGenerator();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(hg.Current);  // 1Di2015NewLine        hg.DownOneLevel();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(hg.Current);  // 1.1Di2015NewLine        hg.DownOneLevel();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(hg.Current);  // 1.1.1Di2015NewLine        hg.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(hg.Current);  // 1.1.2Di2015NewLine        hg.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(hg.Current);  // 1.1.3Di2015NewLine        hg.UpLevels(1);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(hg.Current);  // 1.2Di2015NewLine        hg.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(hg.Current);  // 1.3Di2015NewLine        hg.UpLevels(1);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(hg.Current);  // 2Di2015NewLine        hg.DownOneLevel();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(hg.Current);  // 2.1Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

//Manage cookiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region CookieManagementDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (this.gCookies != null && this.gCookies.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            gRequest.CookieContainer.Add(gCookies);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           //logic to postdata to the formDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //post data logic endsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get Response for this request urlDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            gResponse = (HttpWebResponse)gRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //check if the status code is okDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (gResponse.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //get all the cookies from the current request and add them to the response object cookiesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                gResponse.Cookies = gRequest.CookieContainer.GetCookies(gRequest.RequestUri);Di2015NewLine                //check if response object has any cookies or notDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (gResponse.Cookies.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //check if this is the first request/response, if this is the response of first request gCookiesDi2015NewLine                    //will be nullDi2015NewLine                    if (this.gCookies == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        gCookies = gResponse.Cookies;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        foreach (Cookie oRespCookie in gResponse.Cookies)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            bool bMatch = false;Di2015NewLine                            foreach (Cookie oReqCookie in this.gCookies)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (oReqCookie.Name == oRespCookie.Name)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    oReqCookie.Value = oRespCookie.Value;Di2015NewLine                                    bMatch = true;Di2015NewLine                                    break; Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            if (!bMatch)Di2015NewLine                                this.gCookies.Add(oRespCookie);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(gResponse.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine                string responseString = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                reader.Close();Di2015NewLine                return responseString;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return "Error in posting data";Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3607396Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (RunWithTimeout(LongRunningOperation, TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(3000)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Worker thread finished.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Worker thread was aborted.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static bool RunWithTimeout(ThreadStart threadStart, TimeSpan timeout)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread workerThread = new Thread(threadStart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        workerThread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool finished = workerThread.Join(timeout);Di2015NewLine        if (!finished)Di2015NewLine            workerThread.Abort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return finished;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void LongRunningOperation()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(5000);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3607461Di2015UniqueSeparator    // Mocking your classes, just to check if it compiles. You don't need this.Di2015NewLine    class Response<T> { Di2015NewLine        public T Code { get { return default(T); } } Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    enum AResponseCode { Ok }Di2015NewLine    enum BResponseCode { Ok }Di2015NewLine    enum CResponseCode { Ok }Di2015NewLine    static void LogErrorCode(string msg) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool ProcessErrorCode(object response)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool isOkay;Di2015NewLine        string errCode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!TryProcessErrorCode(response, AResponseCode.Ok, out isOkay, out errCode))Di2015NewLine            if (!TryProcessErrorCode(response, BResponseCode.Ok, out isOkay, out errCode))Di2015NewLine                TryProcessErrorCode(response, CResponseCode.Ok, out isOkay, out errCode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (isOkay)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string msg = "Operation resulted in error code:" + errCode;Di2015NewLine        LogErrorCode(msg);Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // TResponseCode is automatically inferred by passing the okCodeDi2015NewLine    private static bool TryProcessErrorCode<TResponseCode>(Di2015NewLine        object response, TResponseCode okCode, Di2015NewLine        out bool isOkay, out string errCode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var resp = response as Response<TResponseCode>;Di2015NewLine        if (resp == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            isOkay = false;Di2015NewLine            errCode = "UNKNOWN";Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            isOkay = okCode.Equals(resp.Code);Di2015NewLine            errCode = resp.Code.ToString();Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3607659Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ProcessCommand(Expression<Func<bool>> expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The expression is a lambda expression with a method call body.Di2015NewLine    var lambda = (LambdaExpression) expression;Di2015NewLine    var methodCall = (MethodCallExpression) lambda.Body;Di2015NewLine    // The method is called on a member of some instance.Di2015NewLine    var member = (MemberExpression) methodCall.Object;Di2015NewLine    // The member expression contains an instance of the anonymous class thatDi2015NewLine    // defines the member...Di2015NewLine    var constant = (ConstantExpression) member.Expression;Di2015NewLine    var anonymousClassInstance = constant.Value;Di2015NewLine    // ...and the member itself.Di2015NewLine    var calledClassField = (FieldInfo) member.Member;Di2015NewLine    // With an instance of the anonymous class and the field, we can get its value.Di2015NewLine    var calledClass =Di2015NewLine        (CalledClass) calledClassField.GetValue(anonymousClassInstance);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3610693Di2015UniqueSeparatorForNext
3610693Di2015UniqueSeparatorForFirst
3610693Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> list = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        // ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        list.ForNext(1, DoWorkForFirst).ForRemainder(DoWork);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void DoWorkForFirst(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do work for first itemDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void DoWork(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do work for remaining itemsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class EnumerableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> ForFirst<T>(this IEnumerable<T> enumerable, Action<T> action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return enumerable.ForNext(1, action);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> ForNext<T>(this IEnumerable<T> enumerable, int count, Action<T> action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (enumerable == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("enumerable");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var enumerator = enumerable.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // perform the action for the first <count> items of the collectionDi2015NewLine            while (count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException(string.Format(System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, "Unexpected end of collection reached.  Expected {0} more items in the collection.", count));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                action(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                count--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // return the remainder of the collection via an iteratorDi2015NewLine            while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void ForRemainder<T>(this IEnumerable<T> enumerable, Action<T> action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (enumerable == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("enumerable");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var item in enumerable)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            action(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3611098Di2015UniqueSeparator// Here, I construct a simple table for demonstrationDi2015NewLinevar table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLinevar column = table.Columns.Add("Tags", typeof(string));Di2015NewLinetable.Rows.Add("Tag1");Di2015NewLinetable.Rows.Add("Tag1, Tag2");Di2015NewLinetable.Rows.Add("Tag2, Tag3");Di2015NewLinetable.Rows.Add("Tag1, Tag2, Tag3");Di2015NewLinetable.Rows.Add("Tag4, Tag6");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The separator is convenient for using the string.Split overrideDi2015NewLine// that strips empty resultsDi2015NewLinevar separator = new[] { ",", " " };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// For the demo, we'll sort by number of tags matching the third rowDi2015NewLinevar current = table.Rows[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This splits the string into an array for convenient processing laterDi2015NewLinevar currenttags = current.Field<string>("Tags")Di2015NewLine                         .Split(separator, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The query splits out each tags field into an array convenient for processing,Di2015NewLine// counts the number of tags contained in the currenttags array,Di2015NewLine// sorts, and then selects the entire row.Di2015NewLinevar query = from row in table.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine            let tags = row.Field<string>("Tags")Di2015NewLine                          .Split(separator, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries)Di2015NewLine            let count = tags.Count(t => currenttags.Contains(t))Di2015NewLine            orderby count descendingDi2015NewLine            select row;Di2015NewLine

3615831Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void DownloadRemoteImageFile(string uri, string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(uri);Di2015NewLine    HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check that the remote file was found. The ContentTypeDi2015NewLine    // check is performed since a request for a non-existentDi2015NewLine    // image file might be redirected to a 404-page, which wouldDi2015NewLine    // yield the StatusCode "OK", even though the image was notDi2015NewLine    // found.Di2015NewLine    if ((response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK || Di2015NewLine        response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.Moved || Di2015NewLine        response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.Redirect) &&Di2015NewLine        response.ContentType.StartsWith("image",StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if the remote file was found, download oitDi2015NewLine        using (Stream inputStream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine        using (Stream outputStream = File.OpenWrite(fileName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];Di2015NewLine            int bytesRead;Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bytesRead = inputStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                outputStream.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine            } while (bytesRead != 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3619255Di2015UniqueSeparator// important: declare the input parameter to be an **array** of T, not T.Di2015NewLinestatic void SerializeObject<T>(T[] obj) where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string fileName = Guid.NewGuid().ToString().Replace("-", "") + ".xml";Di2015NewLine    using (FileStream fs = File.Create(fileName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializerNamespaces ns = new XmlSerializerNamespaces();Di2015NewLine        ns.Add("", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // override default root node name.  based on your question, Di2015NewLine        // i'm just going to append an "s" to the base type Di2015NewLine        // (e.g., Person becomes Persons)Di2015NewLine        var rootName = typeof(T).Name + "s";Di2015NewLine        XmlRootAttribute root = new XmlRootAttribute(rootName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add the attribute to the serializer constructor...Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer ser = new XmlSerializer(obj.GetType(), root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ser.Serialize(fs, obj, ns);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

         PathSegments(stream, stack, store);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return store;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        static void PathSegments(Stream stream, ConcurrentStack<KeyValuePair<string, int>> stack, ConcurrentDictionary<string, Segment> store)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var reader =       stack.TryPeek(out ep);Di2015NewLine                    stack.Push(new KeyValuePair<string, int>(ep.Key + Path(reader), line.LinePosition - 2));Di2015NewLine ok;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (reader.NodeType == XmlNodeType.EndElement)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (stack.TryPop(out ep))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var length = line.LinePosition + reader.LocalName.Length - ep.Value;Di2015NewLine length));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!element.HasAttributes)Di2015NewLine                return "/" + element.LocalName;Di2015NewLine            var id = "/{0}" : "/{0}-{1}", element.LocalName, id);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3627380Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Example Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   static void Main() Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      string text = "start <p>I want to capture this</p> end";Di2015NewLine      string pat = @""<p>((?:.|\\r|\\n)+?)</p>"";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Instantiate the regular expression object.Di2015NewLine      Regex r = new Regex(pat, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Match the regular expression pattern against a text string.Di2015NewLine      Match m = r.Match(text);Di2015NewLine      int matchCount = 0;Di2015NewLine      while (m.Success) Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine("Match"+ (++matchCount));Di2015NewLine         for (int i = 1; i <= 2; i++) Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            Group g = m.Groups[i];Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Group"+i+"='" + g + "'");Di2015NewLine            CaptureCollection cc = g.Captures;Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < cc.Count; j++) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               Capture c = cc[j];Di2015NewLine               System.Console.WriteLine("Capture"+j+"='" + c + "', Position="+c.Index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         m = m.NextMatch();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3627686Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegex r = new Regex(@"^(\\1.|^.)+$");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(r.IsMatch("aababc"));     // TrueDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(r.IsMatch("1121231234")); // TrueDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(r.IsMatch("iLoveRegEx")); // FalseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int n = 0; n <= 50; n++) {Di2015NewLine    Match m = r.Match("".PadLeft(n));Di2015NewLine    if (m.Success) {Di2015NewLine       Console.WriteLine("{0} = sum(1..{1})", n, m.Groups[1].Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// 1 = sum(1..1)Di2015NewLine// 3 = sum(1..2)Di2015NewLine// 6 = sum(1..3)Di2015NewLine// 10 = sum(1..4)Di2015NewLine// 15 = sum(1..5)Di2015NewLine// 21 = sum(1..6)Di2015NewLine// 28 = sum(1..7)Di2015NewLine// 36 = sum(1..8)Di2015NewLine// 45 = sum(1..9)Di2015NewLine

3628000Di2015UniqueSeparator// Example attribute class for MaxStringLengthDi2015NewLinepublic class MaxStringLengthAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int MaxLength { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public MaxStringLengthAttribute(int length) { this.MaxLength = length; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Class using the dictionary store and shared validation routine.Di2015NewLinepublic class MyDataClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Hashtable properties = new Hashtable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string CompanyNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return GetValue<string>("CompanyName"); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [MaxStringLength(50)]Di2015NewLine        set { SetValue<string>("CompanyName", value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TResult GetValue<TResult>(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (TResult)(properties[key] ?? default(TResult));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SetValue<TValue>(string key, TValue value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Example retrieving attribute:Di2015NewLine        var attributes = new StackTrace()Di2015NewLine                             .GetFrame(1)Di2015NewLine                             .GetMethod()Di2015NewLine                             .GetCustomAttributes(typeof(MaxStringLengthAttribute), true);Di2015NewLine        // With the attribute in hand, perform validation here...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        properties[key] = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3628188Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void RegisterEvent(object targetObject, string eventName, string methodName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var eventInfo = targetObject.GetType().GetEvent(eventName);Di2015NewLine    var method = eventInfo.EventHandlerType.GetMethod("Invoke");Di2015NewLine    var types = method.GetParameters().Select(param => param.ParameterType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var methodInfo = typeof(QueryWindow).GetMethod(methodName, new[] { typeof(object) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // replaced typeof(void) by null      Di2015NewLine    var dynamicMethod = new DynamicMethod(eventInfo.EventHandlerType.Name, null, types.ToArray(), typeof(QueryWindow));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ILGenerator ilGenerator = dynamicMethod.GetILGenerator(256);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Using Ldarg_0 to pass the sender to methodName ; Ldarg_1 to pass the event argsDi2015NewLine    ilGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine    ilGenerator.EmitCall(OpCodes.Call, methodInfo, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Added returnDi2015NewLine    ilGenerator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Removed parameter definition (implicit from DynamicMethod constructor)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Removed the target argumentDi2015NewLine    var methodDelegate = dynamicMethod.CreateDelegate(eventInfo.EventHandlerType);Di2015NewLine    eventInfo.AddEventHandler(targetObject, methodDelegate);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3628188Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class QueryWindowDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void RegisterEvent(object targetObject, string eventName, string methodName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var eventInfo = targetObject.GetType().GetEvent(eventName);Di2015NewLine        var sender = Expression.Parameter(typeof (object), "sender");Di2015NewLine        var e = Expression.Parameter(typeof (EventArgs), "e");Di2015NewLine        var body = Expression.Call(Expression.Constant(this), methodName, null, e);Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda(eventInfo.EventHandlerType, body, sender, e);Di2015NewLine        eventInfo.AddEventHandler(targetObject, lambda.Compile() );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnEvent(object o)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(o);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

i < times; i++)Di2015NewLine            {   Di2015NewLine                Model newModel = new Model() Di2015NewLine                    { Di2015NewLine                        Name = "NewModel" + ctr.ToString(),Di2015NewLine                        Description = "Description for NewModel" + ctr.ToString()Di2015NewLine                    };Di2015NewLine                ctr++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Replace a random item in VM with a new one.Di2015NewLine                int n = r.Next(times);Di2015NewLine                vm.Replace(vm.ModelCollectionView.GetItemAt(n) as Model, newModel);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
