3629130Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass TimeSpanFormatter : IFormatProvider, ICustomFormatterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Regex _formatParser;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TimeSpanFormatter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _formatParser = new Regex("d{1,2}|h{1,2}|m{1,2}|s{1,2}|f{1,7}", RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IFormatProvider MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object GetFormat(Type formatType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(ICustomFormatter).Equals(formatType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region ICustomFormatter MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Format(string format, object arg, IFormatProvider formatProvider)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (arg is TimeSpan)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var timeSpan = (TimeSpan)arg;Di2015NewLine            return _formatParser.Replace(format, GetMatchEvaluator(timeSpan));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var formattable = arg as IFormattable;Di2015NewLine            if (formattable != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return formattable.ToString(format, formatProvider);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return arg != null ? arg.ToString() : string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private MatchEvaluator GetMatchEvaluator(TimeSpan timeSpan)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return m => EvaluateMatch(m, timeSpan);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string EvaluateMatch(Match match, TimeSpan timeSpan)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (match.Value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "dd":Di2015NewLine                return timeSpan.Days.ToString("00");Di2015NewLine            case "d":Di2015NewLine                return timeSpan.Days.ToString("0");Di2015NewLine            case "hh":Di2015NewLine                return timeSpan.Hours.ToString("00");Di2015NewLine            case "h":Di2015NewLine                return timeSpan.Hours.ToString("0");Di2015NewLine            case "mm":Di2015NewLine                return timeSpan.Minutes.ToString("00");Di2015NewLine            case "m":Di2015NewLine                return timeSpan.Minutes.ToString("0");Di2015NewLine            case "ss":Di2015NewLine                return timeSpan.Seconds.ToString("00");Di2015NewLine            case "s":Di2015NewLine                return timeSpan.Seconds.ToString("0");Di2015NewLine            case "fffffff":Di2015NewLine                return (timeSpan.Milliseconds * 10000).ToString("0000000");Di2015NewLine            case "ffffff":Di2015NewLine                return (timeSpan.Milliseconds * 1000).ToString("000000");Di2015NewLine            case "fffff":Di2015NewLine                return (timeSpan.Milliseconds * 100).ToString("00000");Di2015NewLine            case "ffff":Di2015NewLine                return (timeSpan.Milliseconds * 10).ToString("0000");Di2015NewLine            case "fff":Di2015NewLine                return (timeSpan.Milliseconds).ToString("000");Di2015NewLine            case "ff":Di2015NewLine                return (timeSpan.Milliseconds / 10).ToString("00");Di2015NewLine            case "f":Di2015NewLine                return (timeSpan.Milliseconds / 100).ToString("0");Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return match.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3630919Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string MakeIsbn(string isbn) // string must have 9 digitsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (isbn == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    isbn = NormalizeIsbn (isbn);Di2015NewLine    if (isbn.Length != 9)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int result;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i != 9; i++)Di2015NewLine        if (!int.TryParse(isbn[i].ToString(), out result))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int sum = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i != 9; i++)Di2015NewLine        sum += (i + 1) * int.Parse(isbn[i].ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int remainder = sum % 11;Di2015NewLine    if (remainder == 10)Di2015NewLine        return isbn + 'X';Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return isbn + (char)('0' + remainder);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3633158Di2015UniqueSeparatorint Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   string currentExecutable = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().Location;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   bool inChild = false;Di2015NewLine   List<string> xargs = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine   foreach (string arg in xargs)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      if (arg.Equals("-child"))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         inChild = true;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      /* Parse other command line arguments */Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         xargs.Add(arg);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (!inChild)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      AppDomainSetup info = new AppDomainSetup();Di2015NewLine      info.ConfigurationFile = /* Path to desired App.Config File */;Di2015NewLine      Evidence evidence = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.Evidence;Di2015NewLine      AppDomain domain = AppDomain.CreateDomain(friendlyName, evidence, info);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      xargs.Add("-child"); // Prevent recursionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return domain.ExecuteAssembly(currentExecutable, evidence, xargs.ToArray());Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Execute actual Main-Code, we are in the child domain with the custom app.configDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   return 0;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3637855Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlockingCollection<T>
3637855Di2015UniqueSeparatorQueue<T>
3637855Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MessagePump<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // In your case you would set this to your Ultrasound object.Di2015NewLine    // You could just as easily design this class to be "object-agnostic";Di2015NewLine    // but I think that coupling an instance to a specific object makes it clearerDi2015NewLine    // what the purpose of the MessagePump<T> is.Di2015NewLine    private T _obj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private BlockingCollection<Action<T>> _workItems;Di2015NewLine    private Thread _thread;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MessagePump(T obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _obj = obj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Note: the default underlying data store for a BlockingCollection<T>Di2015NewLine        // is a FIFO ConcurrentQueue<T>, which is what we want.Di2015NewLine        _workItems = new BlockingCollection<Action<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _thread = new Thread(ProcessQueue);Di2015NewLine        _thread.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine        _thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Submit(Action<T> workItem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _workItems.Add(workItem);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ProcessQueue()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (;;)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Action<T> workItem = _workItems.Take();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                workItem(_obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Put in some exception handling mechanism so thatDi2015NewLine                // this thread is always running. One idea would be toDi2015NewLine                // raise an event containing the Exception object on aDi2015NewLine                // threadpool thread. You definitely don't want to raiseDi2015NewLine                // the event from THIS thread, though, since then youDi2015NewLine                // could hit ANOTHER exception, which would defeat theDi2015NewLine                // purpose of this catch block.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3638508Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SomeModuleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private BackgroundWorker _worker = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLine    private IDataReceiver _receiver;Di2015NewLine    public SomeModule(IDataReceiver receiver)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _worker.DoWork += new DoWorkEventHandler(Worker_DoWork);Di2015NewLine        _worker.RunWorkerCompleted += new RunWorkerCompletedEventHandler(Worker_RunWorkerCompleted);Di2015NewLine        _worker.ProgressChanged += new ProgressChangedEventHandler(Worker_ProgressChanged);Di2015NewLine        _worker.WorkerReportsProgress = true;Di2015NewLine        _receiver = receiver;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Worker_ProgressChanged(object sender, ProgressChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _receiver.SetData(e.UserState.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DoSomeWork()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // start the workerDi2015NewLine        _worker.RunWorkerAsync();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Worker_RunWorkerCompleted(object sender, RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // call method to pass data to receiverDi2015NewLine        _receiver.SetData(e.Result.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Worker_DoWork(object sender, DoWorkEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do some work hereDi2015NewLine        // assign the resulting data to e.ResultDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _worker.ReportProgress(0, "some data " + i);Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(250);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        e.Result = "Finished";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3638519Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<string>> PartitionLines(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<string> source,Di2015NewLine    Func<string, string> groupMarkerSelector,Di2015NewLine    string delimeter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> currentGroup = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string line in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var key = groupMarkerSelector(line);Di2015NewLine        if (delimeter == key && currentGroup.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return currentGroup;Di2015NewLine            currentGroup = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        currentGroup.Add(line);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (currentGroup.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        yield return currentGroup;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

   End ClassDi2015NewLine    Public Function GetFontDetails(ByVal fontFilePath As String) As InstalledFontDi2015NewLine        Dim FontName As String = String.EmptyDi2015NewLine        Dim FontSubFamily As String = String.EmptyDi2015NewLine        Dim encStr = "UTF-8"Di2015NewLine        Dim strRet As String = String.EmptyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Using fs As New    If ttOffsetTable.uMajorVersion <> 1 Or ttOffsetTable.uMinorVersion <> 0 ThenDi2015NewLine                Return NothingDi2015NewLine            End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dim tblDir As New TT_TABLE_DIRECTORYDi2015NewLine            Dim found As Boolean = FalseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            For i As Integer = 0 To ttOffsetTable.uNumOfTablesDi2015NewLine                .uOffset = ReadULong(fs)Di2015NewLine                    .uLength = ReadULong(fs)Di2015NewLine                End WithDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Dim enc As Encoding = Encoding.GetEncoding(encStr)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Dim s As String = enc.GetString(tblDir.szTag)Di2015NewLine                If StrComp(s, "name") = 0 ThenDi2015NewLine                    found = TrueDi2015NewLine                    Exit ForDi2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            If Not found Then Return NothingDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            fs.Seek(tblDir.uOffset, SeekOrigin.Begin)Di2015NewLine            Dim ttNTHeader As New TT_NAME_TABLE_HEADERDi2015NewLine            With        End WithDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Dim ttRecord As New TT_NAME_RECORDDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            For j As Integer = 0 To ttNTHeader.uNRCountDi2015NewLine ReadUShort(fs)Di2015NewLine                End WithDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                If ttRecord.uNameID > 2 Then Exit ForDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Dim nPos As Integer = fs.PositionDi2015NewLine                fs.Seek(tblDir.uOffset + ttRecord.uStringOffset + ttNTHeader.uStorageOffset, SeekOrigin.Begin)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Dim buf(ttRecord.uStringLength - 1) As ByteDi2015NewLine                fs.Read(buf, 0, ttRecord.uStringLength)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Dim enc As EncodingDi2015NewLine                If ttRecord.uEncodingID = 3 Or ttRecord.uEncodingID = 1  ThenDi2015NewLine                    enc = Encoding.BigEndianUnicodeDi2015NewLine                ElseDi2015NewLine                    enc = Encoding.UTF8Di2015NewLine                End IfDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                strRet = enc.GetString(buf)Di2015NewLine                If ttRecord.uNameID = 1 Then FontName = 3641186Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T MaxFrom<T, TValue>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, TValue> selector, IComparer<TValue> comparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T itemWithMax = default(T);Di2015NewLine    TValue max = default(TValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var e = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            itemWithMax = e.Current;Di2015NewLine            max = selector(itemWithMax);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (e.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T item = e.Current;Di2015NewLine            TValue value = selector(item);Di2015NewLine            if (comparer.Compare(value, max) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                itemWithMax = item;Di2015NewLine                max = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return itemWithMax;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T MaxFrom<T, TValue>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, TValue> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return source.MaxFrom(selector, Comparer<TValue>.Default);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3645449Di2015UniqueSeparatordeclare objectsCursor cursor local fast_forward forDi2015NewLine    select o.name as objectname, s.name as schemanameDi2015NewLine    from sys.objects as oDi2015NewLine    inner join sys.schemas as s on o.schema_id = s.schema_idDi2015NewLine    -- Alter these filters depending on what you want to convertDi2015NewLine    where s.name = 'dbo'Di2015NewLine    and o.type = 'U'Di2015NewLinedeclare @objectname sysname, @schemaname sysname, @sql nvarchar(max)Di2015NewLineopen objectsCursorDi2015NewLinefetch next from objectsCursor into @objectname, @schemanameDi2015NewLinewhile @@fetch_status = 0 beginDi2015NewLine    select @sql = N'alter schema ProjectA transfer ' + quotename(@schemaname) + '.' + quotename(@objectname)Di2015NewLine    execute (@sql)Di2015NewLine    fetch next from objectsCursor into @objectname, @schemanameDi2015NewLineendDi2015NewLineclose objectsCursorDi2015NewLine

3645697Di2015UniqueSeparatorint result = (computer + 4 - player) % 3;Di2015NewLine
3645697Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Play {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public enum Value { Paper = 0, Rock = 1, Scissors = 2 }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private Value _value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Play(Random rnd) {Di2015NewLine    _value = (Value)rnd.Next(3);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public bool SameAs(Play other) {Di2015NewLine    return _value == other._value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public bool Beats(Play other) {Di2015NewLine    returnDi2015NewLine      (_value == Value.Paper && other._value == Value.Rock) ||Di2015NewLine      (_value == Value.Rock && other._value == Value.Scissors) ||Di2015NewLine      (_value == Value.Scissors && other._value == Value.Paper);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public override string ToString() {Di2015NewLine    switch (_value) {Di2015NewLine      case Value.Paper: return "PAPER";Di2015NewLine      case Value.Rock: return "ROCK";Di2015NewLine      default: return "SCISSORS";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3645697Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom r = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinePlay player = new Play(r);Di2015NewLinePlay computer = new Play(r);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("you : {0} vs {1} : computer", player, computer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring feedback;Di2015NewLineif (player.SameAs(computer)) {Di2015NewLine  feedback = "{0} Equals {1}, Draw!";Di2015NewLine} else if (player.Beats(computer)) {Di2015NewLine  feedback = "{0} Beats {1}, You Win!";Di2015NewLine} else {Di2015NewLine  feedback = "{1} Beats {0}, You Loose!";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(feedback, player, computer);Di2015NewLine

3653766Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic enum CompressionTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Deflate,Di2015NewLine    GZipDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Provides GZip or Deflate compression, with further handling for the fact thatDi2015NewLine/// .NETs GZip and Deflate filters don't play nicely with chunked encoding (whenDi2015NewLine/// Response.Flush() is called or buffering is off.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class WebCompressionFilter : StreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Stream _compSink;Di2015NewLine    private Stream _finalSink;Di2015NewLine    public WebCompressionFilter(Stream stm, CompressionType comp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch(comp)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case CompressionType.Deflate:Di2015NewLine                _compSink = new DeflateStream((_finalSink = stm), CompressionMode.Compress);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case CompressionType.GZip:Di2015NewLine                _compSink = new GZipStream((_finalSink = stm), CompressionMode.Compress);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanReadDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanSeekDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanWriteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override long LengthDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override long PositionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override void Flush()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //We do not flush the compression stream. At best this does nothing, at worse itDi2015NewLine        //loses a few bytes. We do however flush the underlying stream to send bytes down theDi2015NewLine        //wire.Di2015NewLine        _finalSink.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override long Seek(long offset, SeekOrigin origin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override void SetLength(long value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _compSink.Write(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override void WriteByte(byte value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _compSink.WriteByte(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override void Close()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _compSink.Close();Di2015NewLine        _finalSink.Close();Di2015NewLine        base.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    protected override void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _compSink.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            _finalSink.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        base.Dispose(disposing);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3653977Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Move GetBestMove(Color color, Board board, int depth)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var bestMoves = new List<Move>();Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Move> validMoves = board.GetValidMoves(color);Di2015NewLine    int highestScore = int.MinValue;Di2015NewLine    Board boardAfterMove;Di2015NewLine    int tmpScore;Di2015NewLine    var rand = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Debug.WriteLine("{0}'s Moves:", color);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Move move in validMoves)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        boardAfterMove = board.Clone().ApplyMove(move);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (move.IsJump && !move.IsCrowned && boardAfterMove.GetJumps(color).Any())Di2015NewLine            tmpScore = NegaMax(color, boardAfterMove, depth);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            tmpScore = -NegaMax(Board.Opposite(color), boardAfterMove, depth);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Debug.WriteLine("{0}: {1}", move, tmpScore);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (tmpScore > highestScore)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bestMoves.Clear();Di2015NewLine            bestMoves.Add(move);Di2015NewLine            highestScore = tmpScore;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (tmpScore == highestScore)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bestMoves.Add(move);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return bestMoves[rand.Next(bestMoves.Count)];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int NegaMax(Color color, Board board, int depth)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<Move> validMoves = board.GetValidMoves(color);Di2015NewLine    int highestScore = int.MinValue;Di2015NewLine    Board boardAfterMove;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (depth <= 0 || !validMoves.Any())Di2015NewLine        return BoardScore(color, board);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Move move in validMoves)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        boardAfterMove = board.Clone().ApplyMove(move);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (move.IsJump && !move.IsCrowned && boardAfterMove.GetJumps(color).Any())Di2015NewLine            highestScore = Math.Max(highestScore, NegaMax(color, boardAfterMove, depth));Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            highestScore = Math.Max(highestScore, -NegaMax(Board.Opposite(color), boardAfterMove, depth - 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return highestScore;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int BoardScore(Color color, Board board)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!board.GetValidMoves(color).Any()) return -1000;Di2015NewLine    return board.OfType<Checker>().Sum(c => (c.Color == color ? 1 : -1) * (c.Class == Class.Man ? 2 : 3));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3654056Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Xml;Di2015NewLine
3654056Di2015UniqueSeparatorXmlReaderSettings settingsXRdr = new XmlReaderSettings();Di2015NewLinesettingsXRdr.ProhibitDtd = false;Di2015NewLinesettingsXRdr.CheckCharacters = true;Di2015NewLinesettingsXRdr.ConformanceLevel = ConformanceLevel.Document;Di2015NewLinesettingsXRdr.IgnoreProcessingInstructions = false;Di2015NewLinesettingsXRdr.IgnoreComments = false;Di2015NewLinesettingsXRdr.XmlResolver = new CustomXmlResolver();Di2015NewLinesettingsXRdr.ValidationType = ValidationType.DTD;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is a format string; notice the placeholder {0} where the fragment will be injected:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring mixFmtString1 = @"<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC ""-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN"" ""http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd""[Di2015NewLine<!ATTLIST htmlDi2015NewLinexmlns:xsi CDATA #FIXED ""http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance""Di2015NewLinexsi:schemaLocation CDATA #IMPLIEDDi2015NewLine>Di2015NewLine]>Di2015NewLine<html xmlns=""http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"" lang=""en"" xml:lang=""en""Di2015NewLinexmlns:xsi=""http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance""Di2015NewLinexsi:schemaLocation=""http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtmlDi2015NewLine              http://www.w3.org/2002/08/xhtml/xhtml1-strict.xsd"">Di2015NewLine<head><title></title></head>Di2015NewLine<body>Di2015NewLine<div>{0}</div>Di2015NewLine</body>Di2015NewLine</html>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Inject any well-formed fragment via the second argumentDi2015NewLinestring xhtml = string.Format(mixFmtString1, "<b>Xhtml fragment w/named entity: </b>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Creates a validating reader (derived type) because of the above settings)Di2015NewLineXmlReader rdr = XmlReader.Create(new StringReader(xhtml), settingsXRdr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Reads the entire XHTML document (validating it along the way).Di2015NewLinewhile (rdr.Read()) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Do whatever you want here for each piece processed.Di2015NewLine    var dummy = rdr.NodeType.ToString(); 3654096Di2015UniqueSeparator// Credits to digEmAll for the following codeDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void Setter<T>(T newValue);Di2015NewLinepublic delegate T Getter<T>();Di2015NewLinepublic class MagicPointer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Getter<T> getter;Di2015NewLine    private Setter<T> setter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T ValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return getter(); }Di2015NewLine        set { setter(value); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MagicPointer(Getter<T> getter, Setter<T> setter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.getter = getter;Di2015NewLine        this.setter = setter;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Code starting from here is mineDi2015NewLinepublic static class MagicUtilClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static MagicPointer<T> LinkVariable<T>(Expression<Func<T>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var memberExpr = expression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (memberExpr == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("The body of the expression is expected to be a member-access expression.");Di2015NewLine        var field = memberExpr.Member as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine        if (field == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("The body of the expression is expected to be a member-access expression that accesses a field.");Di2015NewLine        var constant = memberExpr.Expression as ConstantExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (constant == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("The body of the expression is expected to be a member-access expression that accesses a field on a constant expression.");Di2015NewLine        return new MagicPointer<T>(() => (T) field.GetValue(constant.Value),Di2015NewLine                                   x => field.SetValue(constant.Value, x));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3654231Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap mask = ...;Di2015NewLineBitmap input = ...;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBitmap output = new Bitmap(input.Width, input.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLinevar rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, input.Width, input.Height);Di2015NewLinevar bitsMask = mask.LockBits(rect, ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLinevar bitsInput = input.LockBits(rect, ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLinevar bitsOutput = output.LockBits(rect, ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineunsafeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < input.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte* ptrMask = (byte*) bitsMask.Scan0 + y * bitsMask.Stride;Di2015NewLine        byte* ptrInput = (byte*) bitsInput.Scan0 + y * bitsInput.Stride;Di2015NewLine        byte* ptrOutput = (byte*) bitsOutput.Scan0 + y * bitsOutput.Stride;Di2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < input.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ptrOutput[4 * x] = ptrInput[4 * x];           // blueDi2015NewLine            ptrOutput[4 * x + 1] = ptrInput[4 * x + 1];   // greenDi2015NewLine            ptrOutput[4 * x + 2] = ptrInput[4 * x + 2];   // redDi2015NewLine            ptrOutput[4 * x + 3] = ptrMask[4 * x];        // alphaDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinemask.UnlockBits(bitsMask);Di2015NewLineinput.UnlockBits(bitsInput);Di2015NewLineoutput.UnlockBits(bitsOutput);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineoutput.Save(...);Di2015NewLine

3654724Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineusing System.ServiceProcess;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DotNetWarrior.ServiceProcessDi2015NewLine{  Di2015NewLine  public class ServiceManagerDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private List<ServiceBase> _services = new List<ServiceBase>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RegisterService(ServiceBase service)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (service == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("service");Di2015NewLine      _services.Add(service);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (Environment.UserInteractive)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        foreach (ServiceBase service in _services)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          Start(service, args);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.CancelKeyPress += new ConsoleCancelEventHandler(Console_CancelKeyPress);Di2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        ServiceBase.Run(_services.ToArray());Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      foreach (ServiceBase service in _services)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Stop(service);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Console_CancelKeyPress(object sender, ConsoleCancelEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Stop();Di2015NewLine      Environment.Exit(0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Start(ServiceBase service, string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Type serviceType = typeof(ServiceBase);       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MethodInfo onStartMethod = serviceType.GetMethod(Di2015NewLine          "OnStart", Di2015NewLine          BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance, Di2015NewLine          null, Di2015NewLine          new Type[] { typeof(string[]) }, Di2015NewLine          null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (onStartMethod == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          throw new Exception("Could not locate OnStart");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Starting Service: {0}", service.ServiceName);Di2015NewLine        onStartMethod.Invoke(service, new object[] { args });Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Started Service: {0}", service.ServiceName);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Start Service Failed: {0} - {1}", service.ServiceName, ex.Message);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Stop(ServiceBase service)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      tryDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Type serviceType = typeof(ServiceBase);Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo onStopMethod = serviceType.GetMethod(Di2015NewLine          "OnStop", Di2015NewLine          BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine        if (onStopMethod == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          throw new Exception("Could not locate OnStart");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Stoping Service: {0}", service.ServiceName);Di2015NewLine        onStopMethod.Invoke(service, null);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Stopped Service: {0}", service.ServiceName);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Stop Service Failed: {0} - {1}", service.ServiceName, ex.Message);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3657989Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Node()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Children = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Id;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ParentId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<Node> Children;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Node Parent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static XmlDocument DeserializeAndReserialize(XmlDocument flatDoc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<int, Node> nodes = new Dictionary<int, Node>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (XmlElement x in flatDoc.SelectNodes("//node"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Node n = Node.Deserialize(x);Di2015NewLine        nodes[n.Id] = n;Di2015NewLine orderedDoc.CreateElement("nodes");Di2015NewLine    foreach (Node n in nodes.Values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (n.Parent == null)Di2015NewLine            n.Serialize(xnodes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    root.AppendChild(xnodes);Di2015NewLine    return orderedDoc;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3658679Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class XHTMLCleanerUpperThingyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string p = "<p>";Di2015NewLine    private const string closingp = "</p>";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string CleanUpXHTML(string xhtml)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(xhtml);Di2015NewLine        for (int idx = 0; idx < xhtml.Length; idx++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int current;Di2015NewLine            if ((current = xhtml.IndexOf(p, idx)) != -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int idxofnext = xhtml.IndexOf(p, current + p.Length);Di2015NewLine                int idxofclose = xhtml.IndexOf(closingp, current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // if there is a next <p> tagDi2015NewLine                if (idxofnext > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // if the next closing tag is farther than the next <p> tagDi2015NewLine                    if (idxofnext < idxofclose)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int j = 0; j < p.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            builder[current + j] = ' ';Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // if there is not a final closing tagDi2015NewLine                else if (idxofclose < 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int j = 0; j < p.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        builder[current + j] = ' ';Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3659245Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string ReplaceEx(string original, Di2015NewLine                    string pattern, string replacement)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count, position0, position1;Di2015NewLine    count = position0 = position1 = 0;Di2015NewLine    string upperString = original.ToUpper();Di2015NewLine    string upperPattern = pattern.ToUpper();Di2015NewLine    int inc = (original.Length/pattern.Length) * Di2015NewLine              (replacement.Length-pattern.Length);Di2015NewLine    char [] chars = new char[original.Length + Math.Max(0, inc)];Di2015NewLine    while( (position1 = upperString.IndexOf(upperPattern, Di2015NewLine                                      position0)) != -1 )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for ( int i=position0 ; i < position1 ; ++i )Di2015NewLine            chars[count++] = original[i];Di2015NewLine        for ( int i=0 ; i < replacement.Length ; ++i )Di2015NewLine            chars[count++] = replacement[i];Di2015NewLine        position0 = position1+pattern.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if ( position0 == 0 ) return original;Di2015NewLine    for ( int i=position0 ; i < original.Length ; ++i )Di2015NewLine        chars[count++] = original[i];Di2015NewLine    return new string(chars, 0, count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3660321Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class HelpersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Random rng = new Random();Di2015NewLine    public static void Shuffle<T>(this IList<T> list)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = list.Count;Di2015NewLine        while (n > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            n--;Di2015NewLine            int k = rng.Next(n + 1);Di2015NewLine            T value = list[k];Di2015NewLine            list[k] = list[n];Di2015NewLine            list[n] = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3663271Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestruct PointD Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int X;Di2015NewLine    public int Y;Di2015NewLine    public int Z;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass PerfTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<PointD> _pCoord3Points = new List<PointD>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int checkPointIndexOf(PointD pt)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _pCoord3Points.IndexOf(pt); 3663347Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegex r = new Regex(@"(?<function>[\\p{L}_]\\w*?)\\((?<inner>.*?)\\)");Di2015NewLineRegex inner = new Regex(@",?(?<param>.+?):""(?<value>[^""]*?)""");Di2015NewLinestring input = "_test0(a:\\"lolololol\\",b:\\"2\\") _test1(ghgasghe:\\"asjkdgh\\")";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar matches = new List<FunctionInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (r.IsMatch(input))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MatchCollection mc = r.Matches(input);Di2015NewLine    foreach (Match match in mc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var l = new List<ParamValue>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Match m in inner.Matches(match.Groups["inner"].Value))Di2015NewLine            l.Add(new ParamValueDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Parameter = m.Groups["param"].Value,Di2015NewLine                Value = m.Groups["value"].ValueDi2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        matches.Add(new FunctionInfoDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FunctionName = match.Groups["function"].Value,Di2015NewLine            Values = lDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3663852Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void ProcessInChunks(string inputFilename,Di2015NewLine    string delimiter, Action<IEnumerable<string>> processChunk)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var enumerator = File.ReadLines(inputFilename).GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            // The file is empty.Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var firstLine = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        if (firstLine != delimiter)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(Di2015NewLine                "Expected the first line to be a delimiter.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<string> currentChunk = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (enumerator.Current == delimiter)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                processChunk(currentChunk);Di2015NewLine                currentChunk = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                currentChunk.Add(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        processChunk(currentChunk);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3667628Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<Message, bool>> exp1 = x => x.mesID == 1;Di2015NewLine        var exp2 = Convert<Message, MessageDTO>(exp1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static Expression<Func<TTo, bool>> Convert<TFrom, TTo>(Expression<Func<TFrom, bool>> expr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<Expression,Expression> substitutues = new Dictionary<Expression,Expression>();Di2015NewLine        var oldParam = expr.Parameters[0];Di2015NewLine        var newParam = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TTo), oldParam.Name);Di2015NewLine        substitutues.Add(oldParam, newParam);Di2015NewLine        Expression body = ConvertNode(expr.Body, substitutues);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TTo,bool>>(body, newParam);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static Expression ConvertNode(Expression node, IDictionary<Expression, Expression> subst)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node == null) return null;Di2015NewLine        if (subst.ContainsKey(node)) return subst[node];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (node.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Constant:Di2015NewLine                return node;Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.MemberAccess:Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var me = (MemberExpression)node;Di2015NewLine                    var newNode = ConvertNode(me.Expression, subst);Di2015NewLine                    return Expression.MakeMemberAccess(newNode, newNode.Type.GetMember(me.Member.Name).Single());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Equal: /* will probably work for a range of common binary-expressions */Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var be = (BinaryExpression)node;Di2015NewLine                    return Expression.MakeBinary(be.NodeType, ConvertNode(be.Left, subst), ConvertNode(be.Right, subst), be.IsLiftedToNull, be.Method);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new NotSupportedException(node.NodeType.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Message { public int mesID { get; set; } }Di2015NewLineclass MessageDTO { public int mesID { get; set; } }Di2015NewLine
